description: <p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-124" translation="Summary of What&#39;s New in 15.9 Preview 3">Visual Studio 2017 15.9 预览版 3 发布了。更新内容如下：</span></p><h3 id="summary-of-whats-new-in-159-preview-3" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-124" translation="Summary of What&#39;s New in 15.9 Preview 3">15.9 预览版 3 中的新增功能的摘要</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#summary-of-whats-new-in-159-preview-3"></a></h3><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-125" translation="Language service support for TypeScript 3.0 features for semantic file renaming and project references."><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#JSTS" data-linktype="self-bookmark">语言服务支持</a>语义文件重命名的 TypeScript 3.0 功能和<a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/project-references.html" data-linktype="external">项目引用</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-126" translation="Improved Node.js development by updating Vue.js templates and adding support for unit testing using the Jest framework.">改进了<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#node" data-linktype="self-bookmark">Node.js 开发</a>通过更新 Vue.js 模板并添加对单元测试支持使用 Jest 框架。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-127" translation="Added and improved features for Universal Windows Platform developers, including ARM64 support, the latest preview SDK, and XAML Designer improvements.">添加和改进的功能<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#universal3" data-linktype="self-bookmark">通用 Windows 平台</a>开发人员，包括 ARM64 支持、 最新预览版 SDK，以及 XAML 设计器改进功能。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-128" translation="Visual Studio Tools for Xamarin now supports Xcode 10.">Visual Studio Tools for <a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#xamarin" data-linktype="self-bookmark">Xamarin</a> 现支持 Xcode 10。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-129" translation="We made improvements to the Xamarin.Android build performance.">我们改进了<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#xamarin-android-build-performance" data-linktype="self-bookmark">Xamarin.Android 生成性能</a>。</span></p></li></ul><h3 id="issues-fixed-in-159-preview-3" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-130" translation="Issues Fixed in 15.9 Preview 3">15.9 预览版 3 中已修复问题</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#issues-fixed-in-159-preview-3"></a></h3><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-131" translation="These are the customer-reported issues addressed in this release.">这些是已在此版本中解决的客户报告的问题。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-132" translation="If you are looking for a specific customer-reported issue that has been fixed in 15.9 Preview 3, visit the Developer Community.">如果您正在寻找一个 15.9 预览版 3 中已修复的特定客户所报问题，请访问<a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/topics/fixed+in%3A+visual+studio+2017+version+15.9+preview+3.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">开发人员社区</a>。</span></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-133" translation="VS2017 15.8 Build doesn&#39;t start if XAML files are not manually saved first."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/319616/vs2017-v158-build-hangs-if-files-not-manually-save.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">如果 XAML 文件不会手动保存首先 VS2017 15.8 生成不会启动</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-134" translation="Scrolling up with the arrow key causes Visual Studio to page up."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/311833/scrolling-up-with-the-arrow-key-causes-visual-stud.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">滚动箭头键注册到页导致 Visual Studio</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-135" translation="VS Diff Compare missing grayout (slashes) that indicate added/removed lines."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/323884/vs-diff-compare-missing-grayout-slashes-indicating.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">VS 差异比较缺少 grayout （斜杠），指示添加/删除行</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-136" translation="Navigation bar in editor has trouble handling long method names."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/271086/method-ddl-in-editor-is-less-useful-than-ever.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">在编辑器中的导航栏中的问题处理长时间的方法名称</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-137" translation="Solution File ExtensibilityGlobals Section randomly switch order when saved."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/165717/solution-file-extensibilityglobals-section-order-c.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">解决方案文件 ExtensibilityGlobals 部分随机切换顺序保存时</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-138" translation="compilation error with constexpr if and std::underlying_type under /permissive-."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/185368/compilation-error-with-constexpr-if-and-stdunderly.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">使用 constexpr 的编译错误如果和 std::underlying_type 下的-</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-139" translation="C++ 15.8.2 crash when editing comments above code."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/324013/c-1582-crash-when-editing-comments-above-code.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">C + + 15.8.2 崩溃时编辑上述代码的注释</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-140" translation="Unable to cancel an ongoing &quot;Find All References&quot; task."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/194758/unable-to-cancel-an-ongoing-find-all-references-ta.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">无法取消正在执行的&quot;查找所有引用&quot;任务</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-141" translation="C++ constexpr lambda compiles, however, Intellisense shows errors."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/158240/c-constexpr-lambda-compiles-ok-intellisense-shows.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">C + + constexpr lambda 进行了编译，但是，Intellisense 会显示错误</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-142" translation="New all .NET core project exception."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/312764/new-all-net-core-project-exception.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">新所有.NET core 项目异常</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-143" translation="False positive for C26495."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/316065/false-positive-for-c26495.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">误报 C26495</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-144" translation="False positive for C26495."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/316065/false-positive-for-c26495.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">误报 C26495</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-145" translation="C++ Visual Studio 2017 version 15.4 Editor Intellisense gives E0028 with constexpr lambda."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/159249/cvisual-studio-2017-version-154editor-intellisense.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">C + + Visual Studio 2017 版本 15.4 编辑器 Intellisense 使用 constexpr lambda 提供 E0028</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-146" translation="LNK4099 warnings when number of parallel project builds is greater than 1."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/190863/lnk4099-warnings-when-number-of-parallel-project-b.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">LNK4099 警告时并行项目生成数大于 1</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-147" translation="C26440 can be declared &#39;noexcept&#39; generated for virtual functions marked as noexcept(false)."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/292031/c26440-can-be-declared-noexcept-generated-for-virt.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">C26440 可以声明为 noexcept 的标记为 noexcept （false） 的虚拟函数生成</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-148" translation="Constexpr if incorrectly instantiates template classes on false branches that should not be evaluated."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/305283/constexpr-if-incorrectly-instantiates-template-cla.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">如果不正确的 Constexpr 实例化模板类上不应评估的 false 分支</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-149" translation="SHIFT + END visually highlighed selection stops on long lines in VS15.8."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/312634/shift-end-visually-selection-stops-on-long-lines-i.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">SHIFT + 最终直观地 highlighed 选内容将停止在长行中 VS15.8</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-150" translation="VS 15.8 broken stl/clr _ITERATOR_DEBUG_LEVEL=2: error C2039: &#39;_Debug_message&#39;: is not a member of &#39;std&#39;."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/316251/vs-158-broken-stlclr-iterator-debug-level2-error-c.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">VS 15.8 中断 stl/clr _ITERATOR_DEBUG_LEVEL = 2： 错误 C2039: _Debug_message： 不是 std 的成员</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-151" translation=".eslintignore file  does not seem to be working."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/317105/eslintignore-file-doesnt-seem-to-be-working.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">.eslintignore 文件似乎不使用</a>。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-152" translation="SFINAE fails to compile."><a href="https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/content/problem/62599/sfinae-fails-to-compile.html" target="blank" data-linktype="external">无法编译 SFINAE</a>。</span></p></li></ul><h3 id="details-of-whats-new-in-159-preview-3" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-153" translation="Details of What&#39;s New in 15.9 Preview 3" class="">15.9 预览版 3 中的新增功能的详细信息</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#details-of-whats-new-in-159-preview-3"></a></h3><h4 id="JSTS" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-154" translation="Language Service Support">语言服务支持</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#JSTS"></a></h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-155" translation="We added refactoring to fix up references to a file after it has been renamed.">我们添加了重构以修复后已重命名的文件的引用。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-156" translation="We also added support for project references, letting you split your TypeScript project up into separate builds that reference each other.">我们还添加了对项目的引用，让你拆分为相互引用的单独生成 TypeScript 项目。</span></p></li></ul><h4 id="JSTS" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-157" translation="Node.js Development">Node.js 开发</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#JSTS"></a></h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-158" translation="We updated to the latest Vue CLI 3.0 and improved linting in Vue.js template files.">已更新到最新 Vue CLI 3.0 和改进的 linting Vue.js 模板文件中。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-159" translation="You can also write and run unit tests using the Jest framework.">此外可以编写和运行单元测试使用 Jest 框架。</span></p></li></ul><h4 id="universal3" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-160" translation="Tools for Universal Windows Platform Developers">适用于通用 Windows 平台开发的工具</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#universal3"></a></h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-161" translation="The latest Windows 10 Insider Preview SDK (build 17763) is included as an optional component in the Universal Windows Platform development Workload.">最新 Windows 10 Insider Preview SDK （版本 17763） 是作为可选组件包含在通用 Windows 平台开发工作负荷。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-162" translation="You can now build ARM64 UWP applications.">你现在可以构建 ARM64 UWP 应用程序。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-163" translation="For .NET UWP applications, only .NET Native is supported for ARM64, and you must set the Minimum Version of your application to the Fall Creators Update (Build 16299) or higher.">对于.NET UWP 应用程序，仅.NET Native 支持 ARM64，并且你必须将应用程序为 Fall Creators Update (内部版本 16299) 或更高版本的最低版本。</span></p></li><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-164" translation="The UWP XAML designer reliability has been improved in this release.">在此版本中改进了 UWP XAML 设计器可靠性。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-165" translation="Developers now have the option to enable Platform Only Mode for all design time experiences.">开发人员现在可以为所有设计时体验启用平台模式的选项。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-166" translation="This prevents the designer from executing any custom control code to improve reliability of the design surface.">这可以防止在设计器执行任何自定义控件代码以提高可靠性的设计图面。</span></p></li></ul><h4 id="xamarin" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-167" translation="Visual Studio Tools for Xamarin">Visual Studio Tools for Xamarin</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#xamarin"></a></h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-168" translation="Visual Studio Tools for Xamarin now supports Xcode 10, which allows you to build and debug apps for iOS 12, tvOS 12, and watchOS 5.">Visual Studio Tools for Xamarin 现支持 Xcode 10，这使你可为 iOS 12、tvOS 12 和 watchOS 5 生成和调试应用。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-169" translation="See how to get ready for iOS 12 and our introduction to iOS 12 for more details on the new features available.">有关可用新功能的更多详细信息，请参阅<a href="https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.xamarin.com%2Fios-12-and-xcode-10%2F&data=02%7C01%7C%7C91af25f718e94848860708d61e6e3740%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C636729856042027702&sdata=Lrmmf8fdxotG%2BSejt5hbVb5J30FMDtdZLmspF1oWhLw%3D&reserved=0" data-linktype="external">使用 iOS 12 的准备工作</a>和<a href="https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fxamarin%2Fios%2Fplatform%2Fintroduction-to-ios12%2F&data=02%7C01%7C%7C91af25f718e94848860708d61e6e3740%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C636729856042027702&sdata=o%2FlCWrprREyHGGn7TwKrQkXS0NjqRvsmqEpFX80cM4U%3D&reserved=0" data-linktype="external">我们对 iOS 12 的介绍</a>。</span></p></li></ul><h4 id="xamarin-android-build-performance" class="heading-with-anchor"><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-170" translation="Initial Xamarin.Android Build Performance Improvements">初始 Xamarin.Android 生成性能改进</span><a class="docon docon-link heading-anchor" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#xamarin-android-build-performance"></a></h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-171" translation="Xamarin.Android 9.1 includes initial build performance improvements.">包括 Xamarin.Android 9.1<a href="https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-android/wiki/Build-Performance-Ideas" data-linktype="external">初始生成性能改进</a>。</span> <span data-ttu-id="3ec79-172" translation="See our Xamarin.Android 15.8 vs. 15.9 build performance comparison for more details.">请参阅我们<a href="https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-android/wiki/Build-Performance-Results" data-linktype="external">Xamarin.Android 15.8 vs。15.9 生成性能比较</a>的更多详细信息。</span></p></li></ul><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-172" translation="See our Xamarin.Android 15.8 vs. 15.9 build performance comparison for more details.">详情请查看<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/visualstudio/releasenotes/vs2017-preview-relnotes#15.9_P3" target="_self">发布说明</a>。</span></p><p><span data-ttu-id="3ec79-172" translation="See our Xamarin.Android 15.8 vs. 15.9 build performance comparison for more details.">下载地址：<a href="https://www.visualstudio.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?ch=pre&sku=Community&rel=15" target="_blank" textvalue="https://www.visualstudio.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?ch=pre&amp;sku=Community&amp;rel=15">https://www.visualstudio.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?ch=pre&amp;sku=Community&amp;rel=15</a></span></p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Visual Studio 2017 15.9 预览版 3 发布

description: <p>TruffleRuby 社区版 1.0 RC7 <a href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7" target="_blank">发布了</a>，TruffleRuby 是 Ruby 编程语言的高性能实现，与 MRI 2.4.4 兼容，基于 Oracle Labs 的&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.oschina.net/p/graalvm" href="https://www.oschina.net/p/graalvm" target="_blank">GraalVM</a>。可以使用 gu 程序在 GraalVM 中安装 Ruby 语言组件。</p><p><span style="color:#24292e"><span style="background-color:#ffffff">TruffleRuby 运行 Rails，并通过了大部分 Rails 测试套件的测试。但它缺少对 Nokogiri 和 ActiveRecord 数据库驱动程序的支持，这使得它目前运行真正的 Rails 应用程序变得不切实际。</span></span></p><p><span style="color:#24292e"><span style="background-color:#ffffff"></span></span></p><p><strong>TruffleRuby 的目标</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>更快地运行 Ruby 代码</p></li><li><p>并行运行 Ruby 代码</p></li><li><p>以较少的时间启动 Ruby 应用程序</p></li><li><p>在托管环境中执行 C 扩展</p></li><li><p>提供调试器和监控等新工具</p></li><li><p>使用 JavaScript，Python 和 R 等语言来添加快速和低开销的互操作性</p></li><li><p>保持与标准 Ruby 实现的高度兼容性</p></li></ul><p><strong>TruffleRuby 的系统兼容性</strong></p><p>已在下面这些系统通过测试</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Oracle Linux 7</p></li><li><p>Ubuntu 16.04 LTS</p></li><li><p>Fedora 25</p></li><li><p>macOS 10.13</p></li></ul><p>更新内容包括新增特性、bug 修复和提升性能。</p><p>新特性</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>为更多外联对象(foreign objects)添加有用的字符串检查</p></li><li><p>C 扩展 API 现在定义了预处理器宏 TRUFFLERUBY</p></li><li><p>添加了 rbconfig/sizeof 原生扩展以获得更好的 MRI 兼容性</p></li><li><p>支持&nbsp;<code>pg</code>&nbsp;1.1。扩展现在已经可以成功编译，但是可能仍有一些数据类型的问题。</p></li></ul><p>Bug 修复</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><code>readline</code>&nbsp;can now be interrupted by the interrupt signal (Ctrl+C). This fixes<br/>Ctrl+C to work in IRB.</p></li><li><p>Better compatibility with C extensions due to a new &quot;managed struct&quot; type.</p></li><li><p>Fixed compilation warnings which produced confusing messages for end users (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1422" href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1422">#1422</a>).</p></li><li><p>Improved compatibility with Truffle polyglot STDIO.</p></li><li><p>Fixed version check preventing TruffleRuby from working with Bundler 2.0 and<br/>later (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1413" href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1413">#1413</a>).</p></li><li><p>Fixed problem with&nbsp;<code>Kernel.public_send</code>&nbsp;not tracking its caller properly (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1425" href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1425">#1425</a>).</p></li><li><p><code>rb_thread_call_without_gvl()</code>&nbsp;no longer holds the C-extensions lock.</p></li><li><p>Fixed&nbsp;<code>caller_locations</code>&nbsp;when called inside&nbsp;<code>method_added</code>.</p></li><li><p>Fixed&nbsp;<code>mon_initialize</code>&nbsp;when called inside&nbsp;<code>initialize_copy</code>&nbsp;(<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1428" href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/issues/1428">#1428</a>).</p></li><li><p><code>Mutex</code>&nbsp;correctly raises a&nbsp;<code>TypeError</code>&nbsp;when trying to serialize with&nbsp;<code>Marshal.dump</code>.</p></li></ul><p>性能</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Reduced memory footprint for private/internal AST nodes.</p></li><li><p>Increased the number of cases in which string equality checks will become<br/>compile-time constants.</p></li><li><p>Major performance improvement for exceptional paths where the rescue body<br/>does not access the exception object (e.g.,&nbsp;<code>x.size rescue 0</code>).</p></li></ul><p>源码下载和发布说明：<a href="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7" target="_blank" textvalue="https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7">https://github.com/oracle/truffleruby/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7</a></p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: TruffleRuby 社区版 1.0 RC7，​Ruby 语言的高性能实现

description: <p>WebStorm 2018.2.4 发布了。此更新为 CoffeeScript 支持带来了一系列改进，包括解析斜杠符号问题的最终修复等。</p><p>主要更新内容如下：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-34597" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">WEB-34597</a>&nbsp;修复：不将 Vue.js 项目中的 XML 文件视为 Vue 模板</p></li><li><p><a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-34889" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">WEB-34889</a>&nbsp;修复：coffeescript 与输出的错误自动配制</p></li><li><p><a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-34887" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">WEB-34887</a>&nbsp;修复：支持 coffeescript 再输出声明</p></li><li><p><a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-29109" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">WEB-29109</a>&nbsp;修复 CoffeeScript 格式化 &#39;export default&#39; 的问题</p></li><li><p><a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-15683" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">WEB-15683</a>&nbsp;修复 CoffeeScript：红色代码：错误解析的斜杠符号</p></li><li><p><a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-35130" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">WEB-35130</a>&nbsp;修复 CoffeeScript：使用 heregex 对文件进行 Throwable</p></li></ul><p>完整更新内容请查看这个<a href="https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/WI/WebStorm+182.4505.50+Release+Notes" target="_self">更新列表</a>。<br/></p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/download/" _src="https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/download/">https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/download/</a>&nbsp;</p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/app/" _src="https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/app/">https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/app/</a>&nbsp; <br/></p></li></ul>

description: <p>GraalVM 社区版 1.0 RC7 已发布。</p><p>GraalVM 是由 Oracle 开源的新一代高性能跨语言虚拟机，用于运行 JavaScript、Python 3、Ruby、R、基于 JVM 的语言，如 Java、Scala、Kotlin 和基于 LLVM 的语言，如 C 和 C++。</p><p>GraalVM 消除了编程语言之间的隔离，并支持共享运行时的互操作性。它可以独立运行，也可以在 OpenJDK、Node、Oracle 或者 MySQL 上运行。</p><p><strong>GraalVM 整个平台包含多个组件：</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Graal：一个<a data-cke-saved-href="http://openjdk.java.net/jeps/317" href="http://openjdk.java.net/jeps/317" target="_blank">由 Java 语言编写的 JIT 编译器</a></p></li><li><p>SubstrateVM：一个对执行容器抽象层的轻量级封装</p></li><li><p>Truffle：一个用于构建语言解析器的工具集和 API</p></li></ul><p><strong>语言支持</strong></p><p>下载包括以下语言引擎：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>JavaScript</strong>&nbsp;— Graal.js 是一个 JavaScript 解释器/编译器，能够在 JVM 上运行 Node.js 应用</p></li><li><p><strong>FastR</strong>&nbsp;— R 语言解释器/编译器</p></li><li><p><strong>RubyTruffle</strong>&nbsp;— 支持 Ruby 且性能优于 Ruby</p></li><li><p><strong>SimpleLanguage</strong>&nbsp;— 一个有关如何使用 Graal API 的示例</p></li></ul><p><strong>好处</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>性能</strong>&nbsp;— Graal 结合了我们对编译器技术的研究，在一些负载上提供比传统 JVM 更好的峰值性能</p></li><li><p><strong>语言互操作性</strong>&nbsp;— 用 Graal 执行的语言可以互相调用，可以使用来自其他语言的库</p></li></ul><p><strong>用法</strong></p><p>只需下载 OTN 预览版并将其用作 JDK。它经过预先配置，使用 Graal 作为默认的 Java 编译器，包括命令行程序&nbsp;<em>node</em>、<em>jrb</em>&nbsp;和&nbsp;<em>R</em>，可用于取代 NodeJS、Ruby 和 R。</p><p>1.0 RC7 针对每门语言都新增了不少新特性 ——</p><p><strong>GraalVM for Java developers (GraalVM + compiler)</strong></p><p>Added the virtualization of&nbsp;<code>Unsafe</code>&nbsp;compare and swap calls, for more details see&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/pull/636" href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/pull/636">GH-636</a>.</p><p>Note that due do the issue with the underlying platform Java Mission control freezes at startup on MacOS. Because of that we removed the&nbsp;<code>jmc</code>&nbsp;utility from the distribution. For more information and workarounds please see the&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/jmc55-release-notes-2412446.html#known-iss" href="https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/jmc55-release-notes-2412446.html#known-iss">JMC known issues page</a>.</p><p><strong>Native image generation</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Support for the Java security framework, see&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/blob/master/substratevm/JCA-SECURITY-SERVICES.md" href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/blob/master/substratevm/JCA-SECURITY-SERVICES.md">JCA-SECURITY-SERVICES.md</a>&nbsp;for the details.</p></li><li><p>Support for&nbsp;<code>https</code>&nbsp;URL connections, see&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/blob/master/substratevm/URL-PROTOCOLS.md" href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/blob/master/substratevm/URL-PROTOCOLS.md">URL-PROTOCOLS.md</a>&nbsp;for more details.</p></li></ul><p><strong>JavaScript</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Improved support for sharing of shapes between Contexts with the same Engine, which allows to reuse ASTs and objects across different manually created contexts.</p></li><li><p>Support for&nbsp;<code>BigInteger</code>&nbsp;typed TypedArrays.</p></li></ul><p>下载地址&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7" href="https://github.com/oracle/graal/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7" target="_blank">https://github.com/oracle/graal/releases/tag/vm-1.0.0-rc7</a><br/>发布说明&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="http://www.graalvm.org/docs/release-notes/#10-rc6" href="http://www.graalvm.org/docs/release-notes/#10-rc6" target="_blank">http://www.graalvm.org/docs/release-notes/#10-rc6</a></p><p>开发团队表示，在发布 1.0 稳定版前，更新主要都是围绕提升稳定性来进行。</p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: GraalVM 社区版 1.0 RC7，新一代高性能跨语言虚拟机

description: <p>MariaDB 10.3.10 发布了。MariaDB 10.3 是目前主要的稳定版本。 它将被支持到2023年5月。</p><p>主要更新内容如下：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/system-versioned-tables/"></a><a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/system-versioned-tables/" target="_self">系统版本表</a>（也称为 AS OF） (<a href="https://jira.mariadb.org/browse/MDEV-12894">MDEV-12894</a>)</p></li><li><p>表值构造函数 (<a href="https://jira.mariadb.org/browse/MDEV-12172">MDEV-12172</a>) — Galina Shalygina 的 GSoC 2017 项目</p></li><li><p>使用长子列表 [NOT] IN 子查询转换 [NOT] IN 谓词 (<a href="https://jira.mariadb.org/browse/MDEV-12176">MDEV-12176</a>) — Galina Shalygina 的 GSoC 2017 项目</p></li><li><p><a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/declare-variable/#type-of-row-type-of"></a><a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/declare-variable/#type-of-row-type-of" target="_self">ROW TYPE OF</a> 现在支持本地SP变量 (<a href="https://jira.mariadb.org/browse/MDEV-14139">MDEV-14139</a>)</p></li><li><p><a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/stored-aggregate-functions/">聚合存储的函数</a> (<a href="https://jira.mariadb.org/browse/MDEV-7773">MDEV-7773</a>) — GSoC 2016 project by Varun Gupta</p></li><li><p>支持&nbsp;<a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/group_concat/">GROUP_CONCAT()</a>&nbsp;中的 LIMIT 子句(<a href="https://jira.mariadb.org/browse/MDEV-11297">MDEV-11297</a>)&nbsp;</p></li></ul><p>完整更新内容请查看<a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/changes-improvements-in-mariadb-103/" target="_self">发布说明</a>。</p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://mariadb.com/downloads" _src="https://mariadb.com/downloads">https://mariadb.com/downloads</a>&nbsp;</p></li></ul>

description: <p>Apache Geode 1.7.0 已发布，Apache Geode 是一个数据管理平台，提供实时的、一致的、贯穿整个云架构地访问数据关键型应用。</p><p>Geode 1.7.0 包含许多改进和错误修复，如：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>改进在启用安全性时，客户端/服务器中的 OQL 顺序和不同查询中的性能。</p></li><li><p>添加了新的 GFSH 命令以获取/设置群集配置并销毁网关接收器。</p></li><li><p>新的客户端协议中添加了一个新的后处理器。</p></li><li><p>Pulse 现在支持传统 SSL 选项。</p></li><li><p>自动重新连接不再重用旧地址和 ID。</p></li><li><p>在滚动升级期间，将从群集配置中删除重复或成员特定的接收器。</p></li></ul><p>完整更新内容请查看<a href="https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/GEODE/Release+Notes#ReleaseNotes-1.7.0" target="_self">发布说明</a>。</p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="http://geode.apache.org/releases/" _src="http://geode.apache.org/releases/">http://geode.apache.org/releases/</a>&nbsp;</p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻

description:
<p>Kiwi TCMS 5.3.1 已发布，Kiwi TCMS 是一个集测试计划、测试运行和测试用例于一身的管理系统，用 Python 和 Django 编写。它具有许多强大的功能，如 Bugzilla 和 JIRA 集成，快速测试计划和运行搜索，针对每个计划、运行和案例以及 XML-RPC API 的强大访问控制。</p><p>更新内容：</p><h3>改进</h3><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Update to <a href="https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/2.1/releases/2.1.2/" rel="nofollow">Django 2.1.2</a>due to high severity security issue</p></li><li><p>Update to <a href="https://github.com/patternfly/patternfly/releases">Patternfly 3.54.8</a></p></li><li><p><code>Tag</code> objects are now shown in Admin panel</p></li><li><p>Add autocomplete when adding tags to <code>TestRun</code> via UI</p></li></ul><p>移除的功能</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>TestCase new and edit views no longer allow editting of tags. Tags can be
added/removed from the Tags tab which also makes sure to properly account
for permissions</p></li><li><p>Remove <code>EnvGroup</code>, <code>EnvProperty</code> and <code>EnvValue</code> models in favor of tags.
Existing values and properties are converted into tags and automatically added
to test runs!</p></li><li><p>Convert squashed database migrations to regular ones and remove older migrations.<strong>WARNING:</strong> upgrade from versions &lt;= 5.3.1 to 6.0 will break without an intermediate
upgrade to <code>kiwitcms/kiwi:5.3.1 a420465852be</code>.</p></li><li><p>Remove deprecated <code>TestCase.estimated_time</code> and <code>TestRun.estimated_time</code>. Fixes<a href="https://github.com/kiwitcms/Kiwi/issues/514">Issue #514</a></p></li></ul><p>完整更新内容请查看<a href="https://github.com/kiwitcms/Kiwi/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst" target="_self">更新日志</a>。</p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://github.com/kiwitcms/Kiwi/archive/v6.0.zip" rel="nofollow" class="d-flex flex-items-center"><strong class="px-1">Source code</strong> (zip)</a></p></li><li><p><a href="https://github.com/kiwitcms/Kiwi/archive/v6.0.tar.gz" rel="nofollow" class="d-flex flex-items-center"><strong class="px-1">Source code</strong> (tar.gz)</a></p></li></ul>

description: <p>Tails 3.9.1 发布了。更新内容如下：</p><h3>主要更新</h3><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>将 Tor 浏览器更新到 8.0.2。修复了 Firefox 中 JavaScript 的两个关键安全漏洞。</p></li><li><p>更新 Thunderbird 以修复这些相同的漏洞。</p></li></ul><h3>问题修复</h3><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>修复附加软件的更新。(<a href="https://labs.riseup.net/code/issues/15978">#15978</a>)</p></li><li><p>使用 Open With Unlock VeraCrypt Volumesof GNOME Files 修复打开 VeraCrypt 文件容器。 (<a href="https://labs.riseup.net/code/issues/15954">#15954</a>)</p></li><li><p>修复 Tor 浏览器首选项中“常规”选项卡的显示。 (<a href="https://labs.riseup.net/code/issues/15917">#15917</a>)</p></li><li><p>修复显示 GNOME 视频的帮助。(<a href="https://labs.riseup.net/code/issues/15841">#15841</a>)</p></li><li><p>卸载 mutt。 (<a href="https://labs.riseup.net/code/issues/15904">#15904</a>)</p></li></ul><p>详情请看<a href="https://git-tails.immerda.ch/tails/plain/debian/changelog" target="_self">发布说明</a>。</p><p>下载地址：<br/></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://tails.boum.org/install/download/index.en.html" _src="https://tails.boum.org/install/download/index.en.html">https://tails.boum.org/install/download/index.en.html</a>&nbsp;</p></li></ul>

description: <p>cmake 3.12.3&nbsp;已发布。CMake 是一个跨平台的自动化建构系统,它使用一个名为 CMakeLists.txt 的文件来描述构建过程，可以产生标准的构建文件，如 Unix 的 Makefile 或Windows Visual C++ 的 projects/workspaces 。文件 CMakeLists.txt 需要手工编写，也可以通过编写脚本进行半自动的生成。CMake 提供了比 autoconfig 更简洁的语法。</p><p>Brad King (8):</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>CTest: Fix --test-load regression</p></li><li><p>FindMPI: Restore MPI__COMPILE_FLAGS as a command-line string</p></li><li><p>FindDoxygen: Ensure policy settings allow use of IN_LIST</p></li><li><p>libarchive: Backport fix for build with LibreSSL 2.7</p></li><li><p>libuv: do not require PATH_MAX to be defined</p></li><li><p>VS: Fix CSharp flag selection when linking to a static C++ library</p></li><li><p>CSharp: Fix regression in VS project type selection</p></li><li><p>CMake 3.12.3</p></li></ul><p>Kyle Edwards (1):</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>CTest: Fix regression in ctest_start()</p></li></ul><p>Marc Chevrier (1):</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Help: TESTS property: clarify usage.</p></li></ul><p>详情请看<a href="https://blog.kitware.com/cmake-3-12-3-available-for-download/" target="_self">这里</a>。<br/></p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://cmake.org/download/" _src="https://cmake.org/download/">https://cmake.org/download/</a>&nbsp; <br/></p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: CMake 3.12.3 发布，自动化构建系统

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>As a seventh grade teacher in rural Mississippi, Michelle Brown's serious love for teaching was only matched by her serious lack of resources. Frustrated by trying to teach with outdated books, she turned to technology to find a solution. She built <a href="https://www.commonlit.org/">CommonLit</a> in 2014 to help teachers like her better address the unique needs of students at different reading levels. A free online reading program, CommonLit combines high-quality reading materials with guiding questions, assessments, and data analytics for teachers and students. In the handful of years since launching, CommonLit has created a more personalized and engaging classroom reading experience for more than 5 million students from Wichita to New Delhi to Johannesburg, helping them become more confident and skilled readers.</p><p>Since 2005, <a href="https://www.google.org/our-work/education/">Google.org</a> has given more than $250 million toward education with over $60 million going directly to nonprofits that serve teachers, and we’re proud to continue building on this commitment. Today, in honor of <a href="https://edu.google.com/worldteachersday?utm_source=keyword&amp;utm_medium=blog&amp;utm_campaign=keyword-landingpage">World Teachers’ Day</a>, we’re announcing a $3.5 million grant to CommonLit to help expand their free, literacy resources to more teachers around the globe. To start, they’re collaborating with local education organizations like <a href="https://www.unete.org/">UNETE</a> to pilot a Spanish-language version of their platform in schools across Mexico with a goal of adding 500 reading lessons in Spanish for students by June 2020. From there, they’ll continue to explore other opportunities to expand to even more countries, classrooms and teachers.</p><p>Technology alone can’t solve all of the challenges teachers face, but it can be a meaningful tool for closing educational gaps like access to quality, engaging learning materials. We’re proud that over the years, we’ve supported a number of organizations that are teacher-obsessed. From DonorsChoose.org, a crowd-funding platform for U.S. public school teachers to get classroom resources, to Nova Escola’s digital teacher lesson plans in Brazil, to the TeacherApp in India, we are committed to supporting and cheering on teachers for the dedication they show to their students day in and day out.</p><p>Consider recognizing a teacher in your life by <a href="https://edu.google.com/worldteachersday/?modal_active=none#giving">donating to a nonprofit</a> in their honor today and <a href="https://edu.google.com/worldteachersday/?utm_source=keyword&amp;utm_medium=blog&amp;utm_campaign=edukeyword-landingpage&amp;modal_active=none">sharing your #WorldTeachersDay story</a> about someone who has inspired you to keep learning.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="CommonLit" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/commonlit.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Former seventh grade teacher Michelle Brown founded CommonLit to help teachers like her better address the unique needs of students at different reading levels.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Helping CommonLit expand free literacy resources for teachers

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>I started sixth grade as a shy student at a new school who spent recess hiding in a bathroom stall because I hadn’t made any friends yet. But I found solace in English class, where Mrs. Ivey whisked me far away from the stresses of middle school to the world of Greek mythology. As her students, we could feel her passion for the subject which she made come alive through interactive assignments, visual projects and a whole lot of patience.</p><p>What I didn’t recognize at the time was how hard Mrs. Ivey worked behind the scenes or between the bells. She answered all of my questions, but I never considered who she would turn to for hers. So for World Teachers’ Day this year, we’re celebrating teachers who look to Google Search to find ways to engage their classrooms and empower their students. When you’re in school, teachers are your most important cheerleaders and advocates, so this World Teachers’ Day, it’s time for all of us to <a href="https://edu.google.com/worldteachersday?utm_source=keyword&amp;utm_medium=blog&amp;utm_campaign=keyword-landingpage">return the favor</a>.</p></div></div><div class="block-video"><div class="h-c-page h-c-page--mobile-full-bleed"><div class="h-c-grid"><div class="h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col-l--12 "><div class="article-module article-video "><figure><a class="h-c-video h-c-video--marquee" data-glue-modal-disabled-on-mobile="true" data-glue-modal-trigger="uni-modal-9XVUQZHKFbU-" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=9XVUQZHKFbU"><img alt="Celebrating Teachers: A Moment In Search" src="//img.youtube.com/vi/9XVUQZHKFbU/maxresdefault.jpg"/><svg class="h-c-video__play h-c-icon h-c-icon--color-white" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-youtube-icon"></use></svg></a><figcaption class="article-video__caption h-c-page"><p>Celebrating Teachers: A Moment In Search</p></figcaption></figure></div></div></div></div><div class="h-c-modal--video" data-glue-modal="uni-modal-9XVUQZHKFbU-" data-glue-modal-close-label="Close Dialog"><a class="glue-yt-video" data-glue-yt-video-autoplay="true" data-glue-yt-video-height="99%" data-glue-yt-video-vid="9XVUQZHKFbU" data-glue-yt-video-width="100%" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=9XVUQZHKFbU" ng-cloak=""></a></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We look for ways to give teachers the support, elevation and appreciation they deserve, all year round. Here are some of the things we’re doing for this World Teachers’ Day:</p><h3>Giving teachers the support they deserve</h3><p>Through Google.org we’ve provided more than $250 million toward education since 2005, with more than $60 million going directly to nonprofits that work to support teachers. To continue building on that, we’re <a href="https://www.blog.google/outreach-initiatives/google-org/world-teachers-day-2018/">announcing a new $3.5 million grant to CommonLit</a>, an organization that provides free educator resources, to help them expand and reach more teachers globally. Plus we’re inviting you to help us support teachers by giving to one of the organizations we work with or another of your choosing.</p><p>We know that teachers rarely have enough hours in the day to do everything required of them, so we’re making it easier for them to integrate technology into the classroom. We’ve created <a href="https://teachercenter.withgoogle.com">a dedicated Teacher Center</a> with resources, trainings, and certifications and ways for teachers to connect with each other. We’re also expanding our <a href="https://www.blog.google/outreach-initiatives/education/what-we-learned-first-year-dynamic-learning-project/">Dynamic Learning Project</a> pilot for its second year, placing technology coaches in 101 high-need schools across the U.S. to support teachers and help close <a href="https://digitalpromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/DLP_Coaching_infographic_v1r9.pdf">the digital-use divide</a>.</p><h3>Sparking and elevating teacher voices</h3><p>We’re also teaming up with TED-Ed to create <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5yA4YiIWMOE">a new Educator Talks YouTube channel</a>, launching today. Together with other partners including <a href="https://www.iste.org/">ISTE</a> and <a href="https://ccsso.org/">CCSSO</a>, we’re raising teachers’ voices, so that their experience and expertise can help other teachers, too. Educators will soon be able to submit their stories, so if you’re interested please do <a href="https://masterclass.ted.com/educator">get involved</a>. In the meantime, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/tedededucatortalks">subscribe to the channel</a> for some inspiration as we start featuring Talks for educators, by educators.</p><p>We’ve also curated a <a href="https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLP7Bvyb3ap45iUHGg_lWnPwGKDMLAu2ic">new YouTube playlist</a> featuring some of the educators and creators who have inspired us. This is a collection of stories from teachers who go above and beyond to support their students, encourage their communities and improve their own skills.</p><p>To this day, I credit Mrs. Ivey for instilling in me a love for reading and powerful storytelling. She had a profound impact on me and the trajectory of my life and career. Teachers have one of the most challenging and most important jobs in the world, so we hope you’ll <a href="https://edu.google.com/worldteachersday?utm_source=keyword&amp;utm_medium=blog&amp;utm_campaign=keyword-landingpage">join us</a> in celebrating and appreciating educators, whose learning never stops.</p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: A tribute to teachers, who always seem to have the answers

description: <p>Facebook “附近的朋友”功能一直没有受到用户的关注。据外媒作者调查，在他的 1120 个好友中，只有 103 位曾经打开过这个功能。</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">然而不仅是 Facebook，Foursquare Swarm、Glympse、Apple 的 Find My Friends 和 Google Maps 的实时坐标共享都没有达到预期的使用度。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">但在去年，Snapchat 收购了法国初创公司 Zenly 后，<a href="https://techcrunch.com/2017/06/21/snap-map/" target="_blank">Snap Map 出现了</a>。它不像 Facebook 只是列表展示好友的位置，而是在地图上更直观的表现出来，你可以进入地图查看好友最新发布的故事。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">Snap Map 很聪明，但它遗憾地埋没在 Snapchat 中一个不起眼的地方。Snapchat 内部使用数据显示，Snap Map 在 2017 年 6 月发布之后，从 3500 万日活下降到 9 月份只有 1900 万 - 仅为当时 Snapchat 用户的 11％。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">现在 Facebook 重新设计了“附近的朋友”并且进入测试阶段，目前看起来与 Snapmap 类似。它用按城市将朋友们聚在一起的地图取代了之前的位置 list，但出于隐私保护，这个位置只是大概位置。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/04115524/dnu8ky94b0upv3z9.png!heading" data-img-size-val="718,388" width="718"/></p><p class="img-desc">图片来自 Techcrunch</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">这次改变一个很重要的原因是，Facebook 非常希望抓住年轻用户，特别是正逐渐转移到 Snapchat 和 Instagram 的那部分。用地图对“附近的朋友”进行改进，或许可以使它成为一项受欢迎的功能，从而促使人们打开 Facebook。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">同时让更多人分享他们的实时位置，可以为本地广告开辟新机会。此外，用地图玩法来促进朋友间的线下交流，也展示出 Facebook 想要促进用户有效沟通的决心，以扭转之前外界对于 Facebook “浪费时间”的负面评价。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">但不幸的是，这些基于地理位置的应用程序都没有意识到，线下见面这件事不仅仅是关乎于我与好友之间的距离，而是关于可行性。如果我看到我最好的朋友拒绝了我的邀约，却出现在咖啡店里，那也没关系，他可能是在约会或者完成工作。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">但如果我仅仅因为看到他们在附近就直接加入，那就可能会造成尴尬。如果我发消息过去却遭到拒绝，那我则大概率会觉得失落难过。或许这些应用需要增加一个类似聊天软件里“online”的标识，以显示好友现在是否想被打扰。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">此外，隐私仍是一个大问题。Facebook 的朋友圈已经非常膨胀，包括工作同事、家人、半熟人、朋友等等，用户可能并不想与这么多人分享自己的实时位置。Facebook 需要找到一个更好地方式让用户可以只跟自己最亲密的朋友分享位置信息。</span></p><address><p>推荐阅读：<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5147024.html" target="_blank">36氪新风向 | 厌倦微信，拒绝陌陌，现在「地图社交」给你一种新方式</a></p></address>
title: 对标 Snap Map，Facebook 基于地图重新设计“附近的朋友”

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>The Internet is undoubtedly a transformative technology, changing how people all over the world live and work. One of the key figures responsible for designing the architecture of the Internet is Dr. Vint Cerf, who along with Robert E. Kahn is known as one of the “fathers of the Internet.” Dr Cerf also been Google’s chief internet evangelist for last 12 years. This <a href="http://www.national-consortium.org/Special-Recognition/Disability-Awareness-Month.aspx">Disability Awareness Month</a>, we sat down with him to learn more about the impact of technology on the more than <a href="http://www.who.int/disabilities/world_report/2011/report/en/">1 billion people with disabilities</a> and why building accessible products matters to him on a personal level.</p><br/><p><b>Many people might not know this, but you have a hearing impairment.</b></p><p>Vint: I was born six weeks prematurely in 1943. In those days, they put babies in oxygen tents to help them breathe with immature lungs. It’s thought that this treatment led to a progressing nerve loss which continues to this day—at about 1 dB loss per year. I’ve been wearing hearing aids for over 60 years.</p><p><b>Most kids hate to be different and just want to fit in. Wearing hearing aids must have been hard. How did you deal with that?</b></p><p>I began wearing dual hearing aids at age 13, in junior high. It was pretty noticeable. On the other hand, I was already a self-proclaimed geek and went on to high school wearing sports coats, slacks and ties. If I was going to look different, I decided to do it with style!</p><p><b>What advice would you give your younger self about how to get comfortable with your hearing impairment?</b></p><p>There was no hiding those bulky, behind-the-ear hearing aids. Now I’m very open about it, even though the hearing aids are less noticeable. My advice to my younger self would have been to try to get more matter-of-fact about my hearing loss. One awkward problem—especially with behind-the-ear aids—is that they squealed when you were making out. Wrecks the mood. On the other hand, taking them off made me incommunicado. Tough choices!</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="vint cerf in 1956 and in 1973" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Screen_Shot_2018-10-04_at_9.09.03_AM.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Left: Vint in 1956. (Look familiar? <a href="https://blog.google/inside-google/googlers/throwing-it-back-google-leaders-share-their-first-summer-jobs/">We've shared this photo before</a>.) Right: Rocking an ascot circa 1973.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>Did you ever feel your hearing impairment held you back?</b></p><p>I don’t think I ever felt “held back,” although fast-talking comedians are often frustrating because I miss the too-fast punch lines. But I have learned to adapt my practices to diminish the effects of deafness. For example, I do Q&amp;A on stage by roaming around with a microphone so I can get close enough to lip read if I have to.</p><p><b>How would you say your disability has shaped your own interaction with technology?</b><br/></p><p>While at UCLA for my Ph.D., I got involved in the ARPANET project. Around 1971, Ray Tomlinson developed the idea of networked electronic mail, which was hugely attractive to me because it replaced uncertain voice calls with the clarity of text. The development of the Internet was undertaken in the context of heavy use of email.</p><p>The rise of video conferencing has actually been a huge challenge for me as it reintroduces some of the uncertainty of voice calling and I look forward to real-time, automatic captioning to overcome the limitations that medium poses for me.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="postel crocker cerf 1994 copy.jpg" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/postel_crocker_cerf_1994_copy.max-1000x1000.jpg"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Vint Cerf (right) with Jon Postel and Steve Crocker in 1994. The three were part of the team working on the ARPAnet, which eventually became today's Internet. </p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>Was accessibility something you were thinking of when you and Bob Kahn were developing the protocols for the creation of the Internet?</b></p><p>Not at the time. Today, however, given the huge advantages of computer applications, it’s a high priority to ensure that disabilities do not prevent people from gaining the full benefit of online and offline digital environments.</p><p><b>In an <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/health-science/vint-cerf-father-of-the-internet-looks-forward--and-back/2014/07/28/3bc5c728-0876-11e4-8a6a-19355c7e870a_story.html?utm_term=.ac1240e321dc">interview</a> with “The Washington Post” you said, “I traded in my cello for a keyboard.” What would life would have been like if you hadn’t made that switch?</b></p><p>I wish I had not treated this as a binary choice. It is entirely possible to have both but I didn’t fully appreciate that at the time. I did get to attend a masters class led by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pablo_Casals">Pablo Casals</a> at Berkeley in 1958. It was truly inspiring but computers grabbed my attention even more dramatically at that time. Perhaps it is time to go back to see whether I can regain that skill. The cello is a magnificent instrument.</p><p><b>You’re married to someone who has a hearing impairment—but she got cochlear implants that really changed her life. You have quite a funny story about that.</b></p><p>Sigrid was born with normal hearing but lost it at age three after a bout with spinal meningitis. She was profoundly deaf, and functioned in a hearing world through lip-reading.</p><p>At age 53, she received her first cochlear implant. It functioned spectacularly well. After that, she was eager to make and receive phone calls—even from solicitors. She got one call from an AT&amp;T salesperson in India and asked "oh, which part of India are you from?" The conversation went on for quite a while. Finally the poor salesperson asked, "So you're going to switch to AT&amp;T?" and Sigrid said, "Oh no, my husband is SVP at MCI but thanks for calling!"</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Vint Cerf and his wife Sigrid circa 1969" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/vs1969est_copy.max-1000x1000.jpg"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Vint and his wife Sigrid circa 1969</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>What lessons have you learned from others with disabilities?</b></p><p>Jack Chen is a lawyer at Google who is blind and does stuff that I think is nuts (like bicycle riding) but he’s wonderfully open to discussing blindness and his coping mechanisms. It is from my interactions with Jack that I refined and reinforced my own comfort with talking about the challenges of deafness. I remember asking him whether he cooked. He said, “Yes!” Then I asked him, how can you tell if the food is cooked? He said, “I touch it with my fingers.” That’s when I said I wasn’t going to eat steaks that he pan fried. We both had a good laugh. It’s incredibly important to be able to laugh about some of the situations disabilities put you in.</p><p><b>What message do you have for people creating technology today and how they should think about accessibility?</b></p><p>It must be thought through during the <i>design</i> phase of any product. Accessibility and ease of use go hand in hand. Many people experience temporary disability (broken arm, leg, finger, blocked ears…) and appreciate the value of accessibility features from that experience. There is no excuse for making products that are not accessible. </p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Vint Cerf on accessibility, the cello and noisy hearing aids

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>As mobile platforms with global scale and billions of users, a core tenet of Google Play and Android is to have a positive effect on and change the communities in which we operate. Over the years, we’ve facilitated innumerable connections between people, developers, and nonprofits, and in the video below, we share the stories of four incredible apps that create social impact around the world.</p></div></div><div class="block-video"><div class="h-c-page h-c-page--mobile-full-bleed"><div class="h-c-grid"><div class="h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col-l--12 "><div class="article-module article-video "><figure><a class="h-c-video h-c-video--marquee" data-glue-modal-disabled-on-mobile="true" data-glue-modal-trigger="uni-modal-WUGaB5e83wg-" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=WUGaB5e83wg"><div class="article-video__aspect-image" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Screen_Shot_2018-10-04_at_10.12.00_AM.max-1000x1000.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Making a difference with Android and Google Play</span></div><svg class="h-c-video__play h-c-icon h-c-icon--color-white" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-youtube-icon"></use></svg></a></figure></div></div></div></div><div class="h-c-modal--video" data-glue-modal="uni-modal-WUGaB5e83wg-" data-glue-modal-close-label="Close Dialog"><a class="glue-yt-video" data-glue-yt-video-autoplay="true" data-glue-yt-video-height="99%" data-glue-yt-video-vid="WUGaB5e83wg" data-glue-yt-video-width="100%" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=WUGaB5e83wg" ng-cloak=""></a></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jrustonapps.myearthquakealerts&amp;e=-EnableAppDetailsPageRedesign">My Earthquake Alerts</a> sends free, real time push notifications to alert users of severe earthquakes close to their location. This warning system can mean the difference between lives saved and lives lost when disaster strikes.</p><p>In situations where access to high-quality education is limited or costly, an app can help ease the strain. One example is <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=elvis10ten.com.past_questions&amp;hl=en&amp;e=-EnableAppDetailsPageRedesign">Prepup</a>, an effective mobile tool for students to prepare for common exams written in Nigeria and other African countries.</p><p>Positive impact surrounding Android apps is often created both on- and off- mobile. The founders of <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cc.forestapp&amp;e=-EnableAppDetailsPageRedesign">Forest: Stay focused</a> are building an effective tool to help people disconnect from their smartphones for short periods of time and are also contributing to real world reforestation efforts by allowing in-app actions to become real trees being planted where they are needed most.</p><p>Some apps can also help improve the financial outcomes for their users. For example, <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.propel.ebenefits&amp;e=-EnableAppDetailsPageRedesign">Fresh EBT</a> enables US users to easily view their food stamps balance, track their spending habits, and find nearby shops that accept EBT. The app can also help people save money with coupons. We believe that financial health represents a sizable social impact opportunity for fintech entrepreneurs on Google Play and Android.</p><p>If you are a developer, then head over to this <a href="https://medium.com/googleplaydev/how-to-make-a-difference-develop-for-social-impact-on-google-play-f00a8971c955">post on Medium</a> to learn about the massive opportunity to drive positive social impact with Android and how to bring your social impact idea to mobile and achieve sustainable growth.</p><br/></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: Android
title: Making a difference with Android and Google Play

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>When my friends and I are getting ready to head out to dinner, there's always a moment when we stop to ask who is going to order our ride. Now, Google can take care of it. This week, we’re rolling out a new way to easily book ride services with your Google Assistant.</p><p>With your Android phone, iPhone, Google Home, or any smart speaker with the Assistant, start by saying, “Hey Google, book a ride to the Bluebird Cafe” or “Hey Google, get me a taxi to Denver International Airport.” You will then be given a list of popular ride services to select from, including Uber, Lyft, Ola, Grab, GO-JEK and many more, along with more information on estimated pricing and wait times from each service. If you only want ride options from a single provider, just include their name in your request, for example, “Hey Google, get me a Lyft ride to SFO.”</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Lyft example_Book a Ride" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Ridesharing_lyft_1.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Then grab your phone and tap on your preferred ride service, and the app will open to let you confirm the booking. The feature will be available first in English and any country where one of our supported ride service partners operate. We plan to expand to more languages in the coming months.</p><p>If you’re in a hurry and your hands are all tied up, you’ll now be able to use the Assistant to see all your favorite ride services in one place and pick the one that works best for you.</p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Book a ride with the Google Assistant

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Podcasting has quickly become one of the best ways to share and listen to stories, but its future depends on a diverse array of stories, voices and creators. With the <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/android/listen-google-podcasts-now-android/">launch</a> of the Google Podcasts app in June, we’re working to make it easier for people around the world to find and access podcasts. While there are more podcasts than ever before, there continues to be an imbalance in who is creating them. Women and people of color are still underrepresented as hosts, and many of the world’s most popular podcasts hail from western, urban areas. In June we announced the Google Podcasts creator program, which aims to support these underrepresented voices in podcasting, and make it easier for people to learn how to get into this growing medium.</p><br/><p>Beginning today, through November 18th, the application window is official open globally for the first round of the Google Podcasts creator program, which will kick off in January 2019. We’re partnering with one of the best in the podcasting industry, <a href="http://www.prx.org/">PRX</a>, who will lead and manage the program. PRX has demonstrated a long-time commitment to promoting diversity and inclusion in the space. As a pioneer of the podcasting space, PRX will lend this valuable expertise to the podcasters in the program.</p><br/><p>The Google Podcasts creator program is focused on three main pillars: empowering and training underrepresented voices through an accelerator program, educating a global community with free tools, and showcasing participants’ work as a model for others. PRX, alongside a global advisory committee, will select teams to receive mentorship, seed funding, and an intensive 20-week training. Applications will be accepted from around the globe. You can learn more and apply to the program on <a href="https://googlecp.prx.org/">PRX’s Google Podcasts creator program website</a>.</p><br/><p>For podcast enthusiasts that want to learn more about what it takes to create a podcast, but are not yet ready to apply to the program, PRX will draw on learnings from the program to develop a series of broadly accessible podcasting 101 videos in multiple languages, as well.</p><br/><p>Podcasts are a way to bring additional voices, perspectives and experiences into your day-to-day life. The Google Podcasts creator program is designed to help support these voices, so that everyone can find a story that resonates with them.</p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Promoting inclusive storytelling with the Google Podcasts creator program

description: <p>Uber 首款电动滑板车终于来了，并且首先抵达美国加利福尼亚州圣塔莫尼卡。该城市目前已允许 Uber和 Bird、Lime、Lyft 在接下来的 18 个月内，分别运营 250 辆共享电动滑板车。</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">滑板车可以通过 Uber 的应用程序预订，用户需要花费 1 美元解锁，然后每分钟骑行价格为 15 美分。每分钟的计费从预订成功后的 5 分钟开始，以便让用户有时间找到他们预订的滑板车。用户使用结束后，需要按照指示停到指定的停车区，否则将面临 25 美元的罚款。为了与早进入的滑板车公司竞争，Uber 在圣塔莫尼卡的滑板车租赁将在 10 月 7 日之前免费提供。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">Uber 的滑板车由位于北京的 Segway 的母公司 Ninebot 制造，该公司还向 Bird，Lime，Lyft 和其他几家公司销售滑板车，通常每辆 25 — 40 磅重的车辆售价为 300 — 400 美元。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">Uber 提供了一种叫做 “踏板车交换”的服务。如果用户在应用程序中预订了滑板车，但在走到他们预订的车辆之前，如果发现了其他可用的车辆，用户可以更改预订。Uber 表示，它是为数不多的提供此功能的滑板车运营商之一。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/04035652/kcsfi9vs40ujnkwq.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1820,1213"/></p><p class="img-desc">图片来源TechCrunch</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">Uber 正在努力追赶这个已经拥有数个独角兽的市场。成立于 2017 年的 Bird，在今年 6 月拿下红杉资本 3 亿美元的融资后，估值已经达到 20 亿美元。根据中金产业研究报告，Bird 在 7 月初的投放量约为 1000 辆，用户规模约 5 万人。</span></p><p>同样成立于 2017 年的 Lime，在一年半的时间内已经融资 5 轮，在 6 月拿下 Google Ventures 领投的 3.35 亿美元融资后，估值也达到 11 亿美元。Lime 的共享电动滑板车已经在全球 40 多个城市完成 300 多万次骑行。</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">Uber 推出共享滑板车的服务是它在扩展出行边界上的又一尝试。今年 Uber 以 2 亿美元的价格收购了共享单车公司 Jump 。从那时起，Uber 已经采取了各种举措，旨在成为出行领域的领导者（不仅是汽车出行）。CEO Dara Khosrowshahi&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">曾在公开场合表示很高兴看到人们选择用单车取代短途约车，尽管这部分的收入因此减少了，但却为城市拥堵问题的解决带来积极的影响。显然 Uber 也在努力树立良好的社会形象。</span></p><p>从加州开始，共享滑板车已经陆续登陆美国及欧洲的几十个城市，不过它们的传播也受到了限制。和在中国共享单车带来的城市问题一样，滑板车占领街道、阻碍交通的问题遭到大量市民投诉。</p><p>今年 6 月，旧金山出台了临时禁令，要求所有共享电动滑板车创业公司 — Uber、Lyft、Bird、Lime、Spin、Scoot、Razor、Ofo、Ridecell、Uscooter、CycleHop、Skip等至少 12 家公司停止在旧金山投放共享电动滑板车，之后统一进行运营牌照申请，最终会有 5 家公司获得许可。</p><p>而在经过 2 个多月的等待后，只有 Skip 和 Scoot 被允许重返旧金山，从 10 月开始可分别投放 625 辆滑板车。旧金山市政交通厅表示，Skip 和 Scoot 两家公司的申请书表现出了对一年的试点项目最强烈的意愿，以及证明了他们有足够的能力打造一个安全可控的共享滑板车的环境。</p><p>共享单车没能拿下的美国市场，却让共享滑板车做到了，这与美国的滑板文化、道路交通状况、政策法规都有不可分割的关系。备受资本追捧的共享滑板车领域，好像正在走着当时国内共享单车热潮时的老路。在经过一段时间竞争后，Bird、Lime 等领跑者优势明显，接下来或许会有公司直接出局。</p><address><p>推荐阅读：<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5144192.html" target="_blank">电动滑板车成硅谷投资热点，为何在中国火不起来？</a></p></address><p><br/></p>
title: Uber 加入共享滑板车的角逐，首批滑板车正式登陆圣塔莫尼卡

description: <p>首先，即将推出的 IntelliJ IDEA 2018.3 正式版比以前更快地更新 Git 多存储库项目（以前，IDE 只能逐个获取存储库）。现在，IDE 在项目更新期间并行获取项目中的所有 git 存储库。</p><p>在 IntelliJ IDEA 中，可以通过从 Annotation 上下文菜单调用 Show Diff 来查看触及特定行的最新提交的 diff。 现在，可以仅使用键盘进入菜单 - 调用 VCS Operations 弹出窗口（Windows 和 Linux 上的 macOS/Alt +`上 的 Ctrl-V）并选择 Annotated Line | Show Diff，或者您需要的任何操作或选项。</p><h3>Java</h3><p>添加了一个方便的快速修复程序，用于删除“常量条件和例外”检查报告的无法访问的交换机分支。如果有几个无法访问的分支，并且您想要一次删除所有分支，则可以使用“修复文件中的所有&#39;常量条件和例外&#39;问题”操作。</p><h3>Spring MVC</h3><p><span id="result_box" tabindex="-1">Spring MVC 模型变量现在与 Kotlin 一起使用。</span></p><p><span tabindex="-1">此外，JDK 已更新至 1.8.0_152-release-1343-b3 x86_64 - 集成了以下显着修复：</span></p><p><span tabindex="-1"></span></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>渲染引擎已升级到 Marlin 0.9.3 ( <a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/JRE-958" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="underlink bluelink" tabindex="-1">JRE-958</a> )</p></li><li><p>一些对话框中关注的关键问题已得到修复 ( <a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/JRE-973" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="underlink bluelink" tabindex="-1">JRE-973</a> )</p></li><li><p>已经引入了支持印地语和泰语字符的部分解决方案 ( <a href="https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/JRE-928" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="underlink bluelink" tabindex="-1">JRE-928</a> )</p></li></ul><p><span tabindex="-1"></span>下载地址：<br/></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/nextversion/" _src="https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/nextversion/">https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/nextversion/</a>&nbsp;</p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/app/?fromMenu" _src="https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/app/?fromMenu">https://www.jetbrains.com/toolbox/app/?fromMenu</a>&nbsp; <br/></p></li></ul>

title: IntelliJ IDEA 2018.3 EAP 5 发布，添加快速修复程序

description: <p>亚马逊周二宣布，将从下个月起将所有美国雇员的最低工资提高到时薪 15 美元（约合人民币 103 元）。</p><p><img height="373" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/bbcd6758f8d02d2cf123f851fe2c4f1ae1f.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/bbcd6758f8d02d2cf123f851fe2c4f1ae1f.jpg" width="670"/></p><p>亚马逊表示，新的最低工资标准将惠及逾 25 万名亚马逊员工，包括兼职和临时员工以及另外10万名季节性员工。</p><p>据了解，在此之前，亚马逊 CEO&nbsp;Jeff Bezos&nbsp;因自己与员工巨大的薪酬差距而受到批评，根据亚马逊提交给美国证券交易委员会的文件，在 2017 年，平均每个亚马逊员工的年薪不到 2.85 万美元，而 Bezos&nbsp;的年薪却高达 170 万美元。</p><p>上个月参议员 Bernie Sanders 提出了一项《贝佐斯法案》（Bezos Act），算是“参了 Bezos 一本”。该法案规定，对于低薪员工从政府医疗福利或食品券中获得的每一美元，公司都要对其征税。</p><p>Bezos&nbsp;在一份声明中表示：“我们听取了批评者的意见，认真考虑了我们想要做的事情，并决定要发挥领导作用。”亚马逊表示，其还将开始倡导提高联邦最低工资标准。</p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: 被批评后亚马逊最低时薪提高到 103 元，快圈你们老板

description: <p>据 <a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.engadget.com/2018/10/02/windows-10-phone-screen-mirroring/" href="https://www.engadget.com/2018/10/02/windows-10-phone-screen-mirroring/">Engadget 报道</a>，微软透露其将在不久后支持在 Windows 10 上投射 Android 屏幕。</p><p><img height="524" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/484b028756c9a41ae1906006f34f825b280.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/484b028756c9a41ae1906006f34f825b280.jpg" width="793"/></p><p>在公司的 Surface 活动中，微软移动总经理 Shilpa Ranganathan 展示了一个 Windows 10 的功能，它可以将 Android 手机的整个屏幕投射在 PC 桌面上，用户可以在 Windows 10 中直接查看并回复 Snapchat 对话，而无需在手机上进行。这对于厌倦了经常需要切换设备以照顾到使用的每个移动应用的用户来说，是一个很实用的功能。</p><p>微软称之为 app 镜像，并在 Windows 中配套一款名为 Your Phone 的应用程序使用。</p><p><img height="529" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/51ed2a906890396d6f69b26ef103f7b772b.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/51ed2a906890396d6f69b26ef103f7b772b.jpg" width="803"/></p><p>你也许知道“您的移动 QQ 已经在手机登录”这样的情景，Windows 这个新功能可能就相当于直接是一个“PC 版 Android”；你或许也知道在&nbsp;PC 中开一个 Android 模拟器的情景，但是这个新功能相比之下的区别在于它不是模拟一个实际移动生活中“不存在”/“不需要”的 Android，而是一个实实在在可以同步使用的 Android。</p><p>目前还无法确定该功能什么时候会上线，它也不在这一次&nbsp;Windows 10 十月更新中。</p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: PC 版 Android 正在上线，在电脑上使用手机

description: <p>Google 开放 .page 域名，目前属于早期可用期，在 10 月 9 日将进入普遍可用阶段。</p><p><img data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/acd1e2f799f35fbcd941f0f7b2affe425d1.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/acd1e2f799f35fbcd941f0f7b2affe425d1.jpg" width="901" height="428"/><br/></p><p>2015 年 2 月份，谷歌从 ICANN 购买了 .app TLD （Top-Level Domain，TLD）所有权，价格为 25,001,000 美元，这是有史以来最高的一笔 TLD 所有权费用。在今年 5 月 8 日，<a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.oschina.net/news/96128/googles-app-domains-open-for-general-registration" href="https://www.oschina.net/news/96128/googles-app-domains-open-for-general-registration">谷歌向公众完全开放了 .app 顶级域名</a>，允许任何人注册他们想要的 .app 域名，这在域名界是一个里程碑事件。<br/></p><p>而前几天，谷歌又初步开放了 .page 域名，GoDaddy 显示一个域名一年仅需 10.99 美元，谷歌表示其价格很低，而一旦到了 10 月 9 日进入普遍可用期后，它们的价格会更低。目前&nbsp;.page 域名可以从包括 Name.com 和 GoDaddy 在内的一些谷歌合作伙伴处购买。谷歌表示，“我们越接近普通可用性，价格越低。从 10 月 9 日开始，.page 域名将从更多提供商处获得，并且无需支付额外费用。”<br/></p><p>注册传送门：<a data-cke-saved-href="https://get.page/#get-started" href="https://get.page/#get-started" target="_blank">Google Registry</a></p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: 继 .app，Google 又开放 .page 域名，快去抢注

description: <p>苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆·库克最近接受了 HBO 的 Vice 采访。在采访的过程中，库克谈到了隐私的重要性，以及苹果与中国的关系。</p><p><img height="453" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/0e06eeb9c9b91c9c49442fb4898d292d130.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/0e06eeb9c9b91c9c49442fb4898d292d130.jpg" width="906"/></p><p>在隐私及其对 Siri 的影响方面，库克表示，苹果不认为需要个人数据来改善服务。“不管谁告诉你这些——都是一堆废话，”他说。库克还表示，苹果并没有让中国政府更容易从中国客户那里获得数据，因为该公司在任何地方都使用同样的加密技术。</p><p>另外，库克还表示，苹果在政治上不会以任何方式倾斜，也不会采取政治立场。他说：“用户想从我们这里得到的，和我们一直为他们提供的是一个精心策划的平台。我们不采取政治立场。我们不是在向某个方向倾斜。你可以从 App Store 和播客上的内容中看出这一点。你会看到从非常保守到非常自由的一切。我认为应该是这样。”</p><p>库克表示，公司之所以决定在官方 Podcasts iOS 应用清除掉右翼人士 Alex Jones 及其 Infowars 网络，随后又在 App Store 中移除它们并非是为了迎合硅谷其他公司的决定。“我甚至从未与其他科技公司谈过(Alex Jones)，”他说，“我们独立做决定，我认为这很重要。”</p><p>来源：<a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.feng.com/iPhone/news/2018-10-03/Cook-apple-doesn-t-need-to-user-privacy-data-to-improve-the-service_699256.shtml" href="https://www.feng.com/iPhone/news/2018-10-03/Cook-apple-doesn-t-need-to-user-privacy-data-to-improve-the-service_699256.shtml">威锋网</a></p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: 库克：政府想干扰苹果的决策，没门

description: <p>.Net平台下兼容.NET Standard 2.0，一个实现以Lambda表达式转转换标准SQL语句，使用强类型操作数据的轻量级ORM工具，在减少魔法字串同时，通过灵活的Lambda表达式组合，实现业务数据查询的多样性。</p>

description: <p>tiny是使用golang编写的数据压缩与图片转换工具，提供<code>HTTP</code>与<code>GRPC</code>的调用方式。对于文本内容，支持<code>gzip</code>与<code>br</code>两种压缩格式。对于图片，支持<code>png</code>,&nbsp;<code>jpeg(guetzli)</code>以及<code>webp</code>三种格式转换。一般不建议使用HTTP的服务，HTTP服务仅用于平时测试使用，GRPC的性能更好一些。</p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: tiny-site — 图片优化管理系统

description: <p>同事表妹被安排相亲见了一个男博士，有点秃。碍于面子，表妹勉强见了两次，没想到博士说：你脸型太方了，脖子也短，不适合留披肩发，你应该剪短发。表妹翻个白眼说：干嘛，想拿我剪下来的头发做发套吗？</p>

description: <p>Firefox Focus 是 Mozilla 推出的以隐私为中心的移动浏览器，在最新版本中，它改进了 iOS 12 和谷歌最新的移动操作系统 Android Pie。两个版本都配备了适合各自平台美学的元素，例如，iOS 12 版本具有更圆角的菜单，而针对 Android Pie 则有一个带有自定义功能的 URL 栏和简化的设置菜单。</p><p><img height="373" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/59ceee9492335fb4c3f757391a219027091.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/59ceee9492335fb4c3f757391a219027091.jpg" width="798"/></p><p>此外，最新版本的 Firefox Focus 现在还显示有关如何在主屏幕上使用浏览器的提示，并且加入了搜索建议的功能，只要使用者在浏览器的网址栏上输入关键字时，Firefox Focus 就会提供相关的联想建议。但是，由于 Firefox Focus 是一个专注隐私的产品，因此默认情况下会关闭搜索建议功能。</p><p>目前新版本已经在 App Store&nbsp;和&nbsp;Google Play 上架。</p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Firefox Focus 浏览器适应 iOS 12 与 Android 9 美学

rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻

description: <p>Evergreen 3.2 正式发布了。Evergreen 是一个开源的图书馆自动化（ILS）系统，读者可以万维网实现图书的查找和借阅，许多北美的图书馆都使用它。</p><p>除了<a href="https://evergreen-ils.org/evergreen-3-2-release-candidate-available/" target="_self">发布候选版本</a>和 <a href="https://evergreen-ils.org/evergreen-3-2-first-beta-release-available/" target="_self">Beta 版本</a>中提到的功能和修复程序之外，还在最终版本中添加了一个额外的<a href="https://bugs.launchpad.net/evergreen/+bug/1786987" target="_self">错误修复程序</a>&nbsp;- 修复了目录中的案例：修改组织单位树后，搜索可能会失败的问题。</p><p>主要更新内容如下：</p><p></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>禁用旧版 XUL 员工客户端</p></li><li><p>Acq 发票报告：应修改引用发票完成字段的现有采购报告模板，以检查新的 close_date 字段是否为非 NULL。</p></li><li><p>Angular6 基础应用程序：与 AngularJS 应用程序一样，Evergreen 版本将随所有预编译的 Web 浏览器员工客户端代码一起提供。 管理员只需要添加 Apache 配置更改。</p></li><li><p>异步 Vandelay 导入：NGINX 的用户作为反向代理可能需要在 NGINX 配置中设置合适的 client_max_body_size 值，以便不截断大型 MARC 记录上载。</p></li><li><p>存储在服务器上的浏览器客户端设置和首选项：已添加新权限 APPLY_WORKSTATION_SETTING 以控制可将值应用于工作站设置的人员。</p></li></ul><p>完整更新内容请查看<a href="https://evergreen-ils.org/documentation/release/RELEASE_NOTES_3_2.html" target="_self">发布说明</a>。<br/></p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://evergreen-ils.org/egdownloads/" _src="https://evergreen-ils.org/egdownloads/">https://evergreen-ils.org/egdownloads/</a>&nbsp;</p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Evergreen 3.2 正式发布，图书馆自动化系统
