description: <p>2018年10月1日，.NET Core 2.0 已宣布结束生命周期。这意味着 2.0 系列将不会提供更新。2.1 系列上月作为长期支持版发布，.NET Core 2.1.5 和 .NET Core SDK 2.1.403 版本包含许多问题修复。主要更新内容如下：</p><p>CoreCLR<br/></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>2018-09-11 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/cb730c5c1e"><code>[cb730c5c1e]</code></a> Fix callKillSet for CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_BYREF on x64. (#19780) (#19803)</p></li><li><p>2018-09-11 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/d05c93d373"><code>[d05c93d373]</code></a> Port Fix ICU load on OpenSUSE Tumbleweed to 2.1 (#19861)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-31 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/a25682cdcf"><code>[a25682cdcf]</code></a> Determine memory load based on cgroup usage. (#19518) (#19650)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-28 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/9663131aec"><code>[9663131aec]</code></a> Fix a PAL spin lock issue (#19606)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-24 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/eae0a38b81"><code>[eae0a38b81]</code></a> Fix stepping issues in ARM debugging (#19255)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-24 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/f706053851"><code>[f706053851]</code></a> Fix stepping issues in ARM debugging (#19255)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-24 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/5db8cec4e9"><code>[5db8cec4e9]</code></a> Fix stepping issues in ARM debugging (#19255)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-24 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/70e26d060f"><code>[70e26d060f]</code></a> Fix stepping issues in ARM debugging (#19255)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-24 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/de90cbd4dd"><code>[de90cbd4dd]</code></a> Fix stepping issues in ARM debugging (#19255)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-13 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/6ddb33afcf"><code>[6ddb33afcf]</code></a> Sign xstate binary from correct location (#19470)</p></li><li><p>2018-08-07 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/67a2105a01"><code>[67a2105a01]</code></a> Add Tizen 5.0 RID</p></li><li><p>2018-08-02 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/594400d009"><code>[594400d009]</code></a> Fix version of System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Experimental (#19260)</p></li><li><p>2018-07-31 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/commit/760418ee6e"><code>[760418ee6e]</code></a> JIT: port extra check to struct of struct of x promotion to relase/2.1</p></li></ul><p>CoreFX<br/></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>2018-09-13 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/be79afda4d"><code>[be79afda4d]</code></a> [release/2.1] Fix windows auth when we receive a 401 after auth completes (#32243)</p></li><li><p>2018-09-12 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/76b3ac0136"><code>[76b3ac0136]</code></a> Pin version of S.D.DiagnosticSource on non-netfx platforms</p></li><li><p>2018-09-06 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/ab121ec606"><code>[ab121ec606]</code></a> [2.1] Port &quot;Do not expand stacktraces when completion exception is rethrown multiple times&quot; (#31680)</p></li><li><p>2018-09-06 - <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/ebc79f6489"><code>[ebc79f6489]</code></a> Ensure that TrySetECDHNamedCurve is always called, enabling ECDHE ciphersuites (#32034)</p></li></ul><p>详情请查看 <a href="https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/2.1.5/2.1.5-commits.md" target="_self">Commit</a>。</p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2" style="list-style-type: disc;"><li><p><a href="https://www.microsoft.com/net/download/dotnet-core/2.1#sdk-2.1.403" _src="https://www.microsoft.com/net/download/dotnet-core/2.1#sdk-2.1.403">https://www.microsoft.com/net/download/dotnet-core/2.1#sdk-2.1.403</a>&nbsp;</p></li></ul>

description: <p>Brave 1.0 Beta 已发布。Brave Desktop 是桌面浏览器，支持 Mac OS X，Linux 和 Windows 平台，其特色是能够通过屏蔽程序化的广告，并换成自家的“广告库”，以快速呈现网站。</p><p>桌面版 Brave 浏览器可提升 40% 的页面载入速度，该浏览器其实基于开源的 Chromium 打造，集成了 HTTPS，并且用到了 GitHub Atom 文本编辑器中的 Electron 工具。</p><h3>Brave 1.0 Beta</h3><p><img data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/bd4c6d46af391bd93f4e6d5cfe1bfe8fb4e.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/bd4c6d46af391bd93f4e6d5cfe1bfe8fb4e.jpg" width="747" height="447"/></p><p><span id="result_box" class="" tabindex="-1">第一个 Brave 1.0 Beta 版本包含新功能和改进功能。用于启用或禁用广告和跟踪元素阻止的 Brave Shield 图标已移至地址栏中。您可以在 Brave 1.0 中地址栏的最右侧找到它，并可以使用它控制活动站点的设置。</span></p><p><span class="" tabindex="-1"><img data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/8de852f54382dda4c58d6ed91bec24979ad.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/8de852f54382dda4c58d6ed91bec24979ad.jpg" width="747" height="448"/></span></p><p><span class="" tabindex="-1">主题也有所改变，用户可以在 Brave 设置中切换默认灯光主题和黑暗主题。只需在浏览器的地址栏中加载 chrome://settings/ 并在 Appearance&gt; Brave Colors 下选择 Light 或 Dark 即可在两个原生主题之间切换。</span></p><p></p><p><span class="" tabindex="-1">Brave 1.0 的&nbsp;Widevine 支持在 Mac 和 Windows（Linux即将推出）上播放受 DRM 保护的媒体。</span></p><p>在浏览器的隐私浏览模式下支持 Tor。在<a href="https://www.ghacks.net/2018/06/29/brave-browser-gets-private-tab-with-tor-option/" target="_self">这里</a>可以查看我们对 Brave Tor 集成的初步了解。</p><p><span class="" tabindex="-1">测试版包含 Dev 版本的功能，其中一些版本已得到进一步改进。 该团队在官方博客上指出，它通过将广告移动到网络线程来改进广告拦截。</span></p><p><span class="" tabindex="-1">下载地址：</span></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><span class="" tabindex="-1"><a href="https://brave.com/download-beta/" _src="https://brave.com/download-beta/">https://brave.com/download-beta/</a>&nbsp; <br/></span></p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Brave 1.0 Beta 发布，PC/移动多平台浏览器

description:
<p>Nuitka 0.6.0 发布了。Nuitka 是一个 Python 解释器的替代品，它可以无缝地替代和扩展&nbsp;<a target="_blank" href="http://baike.baidu.com/view/21087.htm">Python</a>&nbsp;的解释和编译工作。它可以执行编译的代码，并能用很兼容的方式将目标代码一起编译。</p><p>主要更新内容：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Python3.5: Fix, the awaiting flag was not removed for exceptions thrown
into a coroutine, so next time it appeared to be awaiting instead of
finished.</p></li><li><p>Python3: Classes in generators that were using built-in functions crashed
the compilation with C errors.</p></li><li><p>Some regressions for XML outputs from previous changes were fixed.</p></li><li><p>Fix, <tt class="docutils literal">hasattr</tt> was not raising an exception if used with non-string
attributes.</p></li><li><p>For really large compilations, MSVC linker could choke on the input file,
line length limits, which is now fixed for the inline copy of Scons.</p></li><li><p>Standalone: Follow changed hidden dependency of <tt class="docutils literal">PyQt5</tt> to <tt class="docutils literal">PyQt5.sip</tt>for newer versions</p></li><li><p>Standalone: Include certificate file using by <tt class="docutils literal">requests</tt> module in some
cases as a data file.</p></li></ul><p>完整更新内容请查看<a href="http://nuitka.net/posts/nuitka-release-060.html" target="_self">发布说明</a>。</p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="http://nuitka.net/pages/download.html" _src="http://nuitka.net/pages/download.html">http://nuitka.net/pages/download.html</a>&nbsp; <br/></p></li></ul>

title: Nuitka 0.6.0 发布，Python 解释器

description:
<p><strong>流行好用的压缩工具，支持鼠标拖放及外壳扩展，完美支持 ZIP 档案，内置程序可以解开 
CAB、ARJ、LZH、TAR、GZ、ACE、UUE、BZ2、JAR、ISO 等多种类型的压缩文件；</strong>具有估计压缩功能，你可以在压缩文件之前得到用
 ZIP 和 RAR 
两种压缩工具各三种压缩方式下的大概压缩率；具有历史记录和收藏夹功能；压缩率相当高，而资源占用相对较少、固定压缩、多媒体压缩和多卷自释放压缩是大多数压缩工具所不具备的。</p><p>更新内容：</p><ol class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>&quot;Delete archive&quot; extraction option deletes all volumes even if user&nbsp;started extraction from non-first RAR volume, but first volume&nbsp;is present and all files are unpacked successfully. In such case，previous versions ignored &quot;Delete archive&quot; even if WinRAR was able&nbsp;to locate the first volume and process the volume set from beginning.2. Compression ratio bar is not displayed on &quot;Archive&quot; page of</p></li><li><p>Explorer file properties for archives with encrypted file names.WinRAR cannot reliably calculate it for such archives without a password and previously it just displayed 0% here.</p></li><li><p>3. Bugs fixed:</p></li><li><p><br/></p></li><ol class=" list-paddingleft-2" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;"><li><p>WinRAR displayed &quot;The specified password is incorrect&quot; message infinitely when attempting to open RAR5 archive with encrypted file names if wrong global password was set with Ctrl+P;</p></li><li><p>memory management bug in the password dialog could lead to access to already freed memory followed by crash.This issue may be also associated with security risks;</p></li><li><p>fixed crashes in corrupt RAR, ACE and LZH archives. This issue may be also associated with security risks;</p></li><li><p>while starting, WinRAR could cause a brief flickering in menu bars of few other applications;</p></li><li><p>WinRAR &quot;Find&quot; command matched &quot;String to find&quot; against all archived files ignoring &quot;File names to find&quot; mask when searching in CAB archives;</p></li><li><p>SFX module &quot;License&quot; command did not set a title of license window;</p></li><li><p>if &quot;Start-up folder&quot; in WinRAR settings included the trailing backslash, WinRAR ignored first &quot;Up one level&quot; command</p></li></ol></ol><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a href="https://www.rarlab.com/download.htm" target="_self">https://www.rarlab.com/download.htm</a></p></li></ul>

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We spoke with Kholis Kurniawan (who goes by the name Awan), a musician from Indonesia. His band <a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFXv8m4g2qlj0PcoUanwiLg">GamelAwan</a> creates unique songs by fusing the centuries-old tradition of <i>gamelan</i>, a traditional type of music played in Java, the most populous island in Indonesia, with more contemporary pop tunes. His music videos on YouTube have been watched millions of times, helping him launch a career as a musician while sharing his love for his Javanese culture with the world.</p><p><b><br/></b></p><p><b>Why did you become a musician?</b></p><p>Music is in my blood. I was born into a family of artists in Lamongan Regency in East Java. My mother used to be in a band. I never received formal musical training, but I learnt how to play my first instrument—the drums—from my brother, Arjuna, when I was 10. He’s also a member of GamelAwan. The two of us having been making music with our friends and playing in bands since we were kids.<br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><figure class="article-image--full article-module "><img alt="Arjuna" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Gamelawan_Awan_and_Arjuna.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption h-c-page"><div class="rich-text"><p>Awan’s brother Arjuna (right) taught him how to play his first musical instrument - the drums.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>What got you interested in <i>gamelan</i>?</b></p><p>Javanese people are losing touch with our culture and playing gamelan is my way of helping to preserve our traditions. I have also discovered that a lot of other people share my desire to remain connected to our heritage. When I first started uploading songs on YouTube, I didn’t get many views. But the videos became much more popular when I incorporated <i>gamelan</i>. We hit more than three million YouTube views for our first cover song that used <i>gamelan</i>.<br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><figure class="article-image--full article-module "><img alt="Gamelawan band" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Gamelawan_band.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption h-c-page"><div class="rich-text"><i>Gamelan has been played in Java and Bali since antiquity. In this image, Gamelawan band members are playing the kendang (drum), bonang (kettle gong), and gambang kayu (xylophone).</i></div></figcaption></figure></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>What challenges did you face in building your career?</b></p><p>I’m from a rural area in Java where a career in music is discouraged. People think that musicians are unable to earn a decent living. Besides dealing with society’s expectations, I also faced the same challenges experienced by other performance artists. One particular show in Bali was a disaster because the sound system stopped working as we were performing. But I learn from these experiences and it motivates me to work even harder for success.<br/></p><p><b><br/></b></p><p><b>How has YouTube helped you?</b></p><p>YouTube is a perfect place to publish my work because everyone uses it. Two years after we published our first video, YouTube invited me to perform on stage at <a href="https://www.youtubefanfest.com/event/2017-id">YouTube FanFest in Jakarta</a> as part of a collaboration with Weird Genius, who plays electronic music.<br/></p><p><br/></p><p>I am really grateful for that opportunity. FanFest is the most prestigious event a YouTube creator can play at. After our performance there, subscribers to our YouTube channel grew a lot faster. We have received a Silver Button for passing the 100,000 subscriber mark. But what we did not expect was that YouTube could get us noticed offline. Since we performed at FanFest, we have made appearances on national television and gotten requests to play at a lot more events.</p><p><br/></p><p>YouTube was even my match-maker! I met my future wife after she left a comment in one of my videos.</p><p></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><figure class="article-image--full article-module "><img alt="AwanandSani" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Screen_Shot_2018-04-03_at_11.06.11_AM.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption h-c-page"><div class="rich-text"><i>Awan and his wife Nur Farida Sani.</i></div></figcaption></figure></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>What are your plans for the future?</b></p><p>The Indonesian and international creators we met at YouTube FanFest inspired us to work on an album of original music. It is a huge shift from our original approach of just covering other artists’ songs. We want to create unique music for people to enjoy, while staying true to our culture and musical traditions. So we will continue fusing <i>gamelan</i> and more contemporary music genres in our next album. Our mission is to use the universal language of music to help communicate Javanese culture to Indonesians and people across the world.<br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><figure class="article-image--full article-module "><img alt="YTFF Gamelawan" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/YTFF_Gamelawan.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption h-c-page"><div class="rich-text"><i>Gamelawan playing at YouTube FanFest in Jakarta.</i></div></figcaption></figure></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: GamelAwan: Reviving traditional tunes with technology

description: <p>B站和它的老股东腾讯再度走到了一起。</p><p>10月3日晚，B站和腾讯宣布，双方已达成协议，腾讯将对B站投资共3.176亿美元现金。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">根据该协议，腾讯将以每股12.67美元价格，认购B站新发行普通股。这笔交易预计将于近期完成。交易完成后，腾讯对B站持股比例将增至约12%。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">这是腾讯第二次出手B站，2015年腾讯产业共赢基金曾参投B站D轮亿元以上的融资。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">消息公布后，B站盘前涨超14%。截至发稿，B站盘中一度涨幅近16%，目前14.78美元／股。<br/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03134454/m7i2n4nl5m6dl33e.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="925,504"/></p><p>36氪从B站获悉，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">腾讯增持B站，双方将形成紧密的协同关系。B站称，这次投资将对公司长期战略形成有力支撑，为B站社区和用户带来更多内容服务。另外，B站将借力腾讯在创新研发和优质内容IP方面的能力，双方共同努力以争</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在版权、投资、出品、制作等方面为用户创造新的价值。</span></p><p>换句话说，<strong>B站一方面将从腾讯那拿到更多内容，缓解愈演愈烈的版权焦虑。</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目前相比优爱腾对版权内容的投入，B站基本算是能忽略不计，去年爱奇艺内容成本的花销是B站42倍有余。且BAT盯上二次元领域早有显迹，B站虽说拥有高粘性Z世代社区，也难道生存环境没受到巨头挤压。加上B站以PUGC内容为主，版权问题一直是旋在其头顶的达摩克利斯之剑，5月爱奇艺曾因《中国有嘻哈》未经授权起诉B站。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">与腾讯进一步加深资本层面绑定，某种程度能为可能产生的版权问题兜底，或许还将有更多内容方面的资源共享。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">另一方面，B站仍在亏损，但生态布局脚步不能停，在资本寒冬前储备好粮草很重要。</span></strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">近期，B站刚拿下12部独播新番，还与纪录片“大户”Discovery达成合作，包括145部纪录片的版权、200小时的独家内容，及内容共制计划。资本方面，B站9月底成为虚拟偶像“洛天依”所属母公司控股股东，实际相当于掌握了洛天依这一重要IP的话语权。7月，B站当上了映客的基石投资者，此外B站还投资了一些产业链公司，如动漫制作公司天工艺彩、原创漫画公司鲜漫文化等。这些都需要钱，腾讯的资金对B而言恰好补充弹药。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">如今，正值腾讯时隔六年的重大内部架构调整，除公司整体大步迈向B端外，另一点不容忽视的是新成立的平台与内容事业群（PCG），它将</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">腾讯新闻、腾讯视频、腾讯体育、微视、腾讯影业和动漫整合到了一起，试图形成合力。现在腾讯与B站进一步通过资本形式绑定，再加上腾讯与阅文间的关系，后续会发生怎样的化学反应呢？</span></p><p><br/></p><p><br/></p>
title: 最前线｜B站获腾讯3.176亿美元现金投资，股价一度涨近16%

description: <p>美国时间 10 月 2 日，<a href="https://news.walmart.com/2018/10/02/walmart-announces-the-acquisition-of-eloquii" target="_blank">沃尔玛宣布将会收购美国大码女装品牌“Eloquii”</a>。这笔交易的具体财务条款尚未披露，但知情人士表示，沃尔玛将为此支付 1 亿美元，这一价格约等于 Eloquii 年收入的 2.5-3 倍，交易将在本季度完成。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03093746/8otw0qd7nyerptrh.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1080,727"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Eloquii 是一家有四年历史的创业公司，虽然其最早是</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">由传统零售商 The Limited 于2011年创建的，但仅生存了 18 个月就停产，后来在外部投资者的帮助下，部分员工于 2014 年重组并推出了这一品牌。其主要销售来自于自有网站，也和</span><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5070897.html" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">大码订阅女装平台 Dia＆Co</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;及 Stitch Fix 的大码女装线合作，还开设了 5 家线下门店。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在被沃尔玛收购之前，Eloquii 一共拿到了 4200 万美元的融资，销售额自 2015 年起翻了 3 倍。线上业务是 Eloquii 的重中之重，为了把握住大码服装的利基市场，<a href="https://www.retaildive.com/news/eloquii-banks-on-stores-for-growth/525275/" target="_blank"><strong>Eloquii 会采用预售来做市场测试</strong></a>：Eloquii 会在网站里放上服装图片，消费者报名后进入等待名单，在产品正式上线销售时收到通知，这让&nbsp;Eloquii 可以比较精确地估计需求，同时分析出各个尺码的库存数量。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">动态定价也是一个很有趣的尝试，一般而言，只有航空公司和酒店会根据供需情况做即时性、大幅度的价格波动，但 Eloquii 也想尝试让用户为供不应求的爆款支付更高溢价。这一系统已经做了一年的测试，将会在商品的整个生命周期里基于算法做动态定价，结果显示其利润率也有所增长。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03093641/gppg1qdkty0s9c18.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1080,902"/></p><p><strong style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">大码是个大市场</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">据 NPD 集团称，2016 年美国人在全尺码服装（与仅提供部分尺码的品牌相对）上花费了 214 亿美元，预计到 2020 年，市场将以每年平均 4％ 的速度增长。各大品牌和零售商也都盯上了这块大蛋糕，</span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/quotes/?symbol=KSS" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Kohl&#39;s</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;在</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">上个月表示，将于明年春天推出自有大码品牌 EVRI，</span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/quotes/?symbol=TGT" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Target</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在 2015 年就推出了其大码品牌 Ava＆Viv，同时计划年底将 </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Ava＆Viv 入驻的门店数量翻倍，达到 </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">300 家。</span></p><p>从沃尔玛的角度来看，这也是其对抗亚马逊的举措之一。去年，沃尔玛专门成立了一个新团队，研究与亚马逊长期对抗的新策略，其中的一条路就是孵化和收购吸引年轻一代消费者的&nbsp;<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5132578.html">DTC（Directly to Consumers）品牌</a>，这些品牌有自己的线上渠道，不会在亚马逊上销售。Eloquii 就是其中之一，沃尔玛<a href="https://www.recode.net/2017/6/16/15815178/walmart-bonobos-acquisition-price-310-million">去年还以 3.1 亿美元收购了男装品牌 Bonobos</a>，希望以这些资金的投入发展起沃尔玛自身的电商业务。</p><p>在一份报告中，沃尔玛这样描述大码市场：大码服装是女装中增长最快的部分之一，零售数据显示，<strong>美国 18-65 岁的女性中有一半需要 14 号以上的服装，但他们找不到又合身又时尚的品牌。</strong></p><p>国内，也有不少初创企业盯上了大码市场，36氪曾介绍过&nbsp;<a href="http://36kr.com/p/5038996.html">Gwynnie Bee</a>、<a href="http://36kr.com/p/5040909.html">大码美衣</a>、<a href="http://36kr.com/p/208115.html">navabi</a>、<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5135092.html" target="_blank">Garden Lis</a> 等。<strong>有数据显示中国有 4600 万肥胖女性，数量已经超过美国成为世界第一，</strong><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5105650.html" target="_blank">甚至大码模特经济都成为了发展不错的细分市场</a>，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">但尚未有销售额超过 5 亿的头部品牌跑出，可见这里存在巨大的增长空间。</span></p><p>—————————————————</p><p>嗨，我是36氪作者詹妮妮，关注大消费，寻求报道或者行业交流可加微信muar22，劳请备注姓名、公司、职位，也烦请直接说明来意，会尽快回复的~</p><address><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">相关阅读：</span></p></address><p><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5074516.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">请问要去哪里买XXXL的比基尼？这个问题背后有一个被忽视的市场</span></a></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5038996.html" target="_blank">订阅式服装在细分领域的潜力有多大？看看只做大码服饰的Gwynnie Bee就知道了</a></p>
title: “胖”经济正当时？沃尔玛以 1 亿美元收购大码女装品牌「Eloquii」

class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-previous" data-glue-pagination-label="Previous" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>Make the most of voice and touch on phones</b><b><br/></b>The new design combines the best of text and talk on your phone, giving you the relevant information right when you need it. Just ask your Google Assistant for something on your phone, and then you can interact with images, sliders and buttons to get the help you need in a fraction of the time.</p><p>The new phone design includes:<br/><br/></p><ul><li>Bigger visuals that are easy to glance at quickly.<br/></li><li>New controls and sliders to manage your smart home devices. Use the dials to adjust your lights to the right brightness, or the sliders to control the volume of your smart speaker.<br/></li><li>An interactive messaging interface so you can use your fingers to add a comma, change a word or make any other quick edits as you compose messages.<br/></li><li>On Android phones, it’s now easier to access an <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/assistant/stay-top-your-day-proactive-help-your-assistant/">overview of your day</a>. Open up the Assistant and swipe up on your screen to get curated information based on the time of day and your recent interactions with the Assistant.<br/></li><li>Developers and brands now have <a href="https://developers.googleblog.com/2018/10/make-money-from-your-actions-create.html">tools</a> to take full advantage of the phone screen. <a href="https://assistant.google.com/services/invoke/uid/000000f2fb2c47e0">Starbucks</a> now has thumbnails to select from recommended items on their menus, <a href="https://assistant.google.com/services/invoke/uid/00000054e4ff25be">Food Network</a> has larger images of their recipes, and <a href="https://assistant.google.com/services/invoke/uid/000000f2742f07a7">FitStar</a> uses GIFs to give you a preview of your workout.<br/></li></ul><br/><b>Welcome to a new era of mobile assistance<br/></b>If you’ve been using your Google Home but haven’t tried out the Google Assistant on phones, now’s a great time to pull out the device in your pocket and find out how voice and touch work together to make life a little easier. You can download the Google Assistant app on <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/google-assistant/id1220976145?mt=8">iOS</a>, or open the Assistant on your Android phone with a long press of the home button or by adding the <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.googleassistant&amp;hl=en_US">Assistant app</a> to your homescreen.<br/><br/>Go ahead, ask your Assistant to help you look up your favorite musician, send a quick text message, check out the weather or control your lights—it’s now easier than ever to <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eegp9AaqbxE&amp;list=PL590L5WQmH8cqX9RfN1cECPPxrZmRmYTb&amp;index=7&amp;t=0s">Make Google Do It</a>.<p></p><br/><br/></div></div></body></html>

title: Your Google Assistant gets a makeover on phones

description: <p>Google于近日<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">收购了一家客户服务自动化创业公司</span><a href="https://onward.ai/" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Onward</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，收购金额未公开。联合创始人RémiCossart和Pramod Thammaiah，以及CTO Aaron Podolny，将与一些员工一起加入Google。</span><br/></p><p>截止目前，Onward已经在此前两轮融资中筹集了12万美元的私人资金。</p><p>Onward最早做的是面向消费者的产品Agent Q，这是一个购物虚拟助手，依赖于人工和数据汇总系统的组合，这些系统从整个网络中提取商品评论和价格，用户可以发短信并快速询问产品推荐。Onward团队将Agent Q称为Magic和Consumer Reports的产品结合。</p><p>联合创始人最终确定将这种功能带给企业更有价值，于是调整方向到以企业业务为中心的SaaS产品。</p><p>Onward的企业聊天机器人平台，利用自然语言处理从客户的消息中提取语义，利用位置、登录状态和历史活动等信息，可以对问题的回答进行个性化和场景化应对。</p><p>Onward的可视化机器人构建器，允许客户使用决策树定制答案，从而提供更大的定制化服务。由于与Zendesk，Help Scout，Salesforce，Hubspot，Shopify，Spree和Solidus的集成，Onward的机器人可以自动跟踪对话，添加潜在客户，并密切关注货件和订单。</p><p>总结来说，<strong>Onward的机器人服务通过从数据库中提取答案，来回答最简单的问题，同时构建流程可以帮助解决更详细的问题。</strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03081600/7ldz3rsdtikre9n6.png!heading" data-img-size-val="680,420"/></p><p>据了解，<strong>Google曾于今年7月在Cloud Next会议上，推出了Contact Center AI。</strong>这是一款机器学习驱动的智能客服，采用谷歌的Dialogflow软件包，通过电话与呼叫者进行。</p><p>Contact Center AI对传入的呼叫进行分析，并使用复杂的自然语言处理来解决常见问题。如果虚拟代理无法解决呼叫者的问题，则会将呼叫者移交给人工代理。Google正在将其作为会话代理的工具包进行营销。</p><p>对于此次收购，Onward团队在公司网站上<a href="https://onward.ai/update">发布的</a>一条消息中写道：“我们开始向前发展，其任务是让计算机参与自然的人类对话。”“通过Google，我们将能够扩大Onward技术的覆盖范围。这些核心技术使我们感到兴奋，我们很高兴将它们带到谷歌。”</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在Google的Contact Center AI，eBay的</span>ShopBot<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">和其他应用工具的推动下，全球聊天机器人市场预计到2024年将超过</span><a href="https://www.clickz.com/chatbot-market-size-is-set-to-exceed-usd-1-34-billion-by-2024/215518/" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">13.4亿美元</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">。</span></p>
title: Google收购客服机器人公司Onward，增强其Contact Center AI

description: <p>译者按：当下，线下愈发受到市场重视，美国分析公司 CB Insights 总结了 Target、耐克和阿迪达斯的部分零售策略，希望对你有所帮助，以下，Enjoy~&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>就在本周，亚马逊在曼哈顿开设了新的亚马逊四星级商店，在该店出售网站上评价较高（4星或以上）的亚马逊商品，同时为纽约顾客准备了一些代表“纽约市场趋势”的商品。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此外，根据</span><a href="https://www.retaildive.com/news/more-consumers-than-ever-want-retailers-to-personalize-service/531809/" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">最近的一项研究</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，63％的消费者对零售商的个性化选品感兴趣。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei
