sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03071621/jhbtnv14yyytos4v.png!heading" data-img-size-val="768,452"/></p><p class="img-desc">如图，亚马逊总结了纽约的消费趋势，推出了“纽约市场趋势”商品</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">下面，我们概述了 </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Target、耐克和阿迪达斯的</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">本地化战略以及线下零售趋势，发现</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">零售商和品牌都要走向本地化</span></p><address><p><strong>Target 的小型商店</strong></p></address><p><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Target 于 2012 年在芝加哥开设了第一家小型商店，面向都市年轻人，提供服装、食品和公寓居住的必需品。时至今日，作为美国的第二大零售商，Target 已经在美国各地开了数十家小店。</span><br/></p><p><br/></p><p>由于库存空间有限，这些小店的选品策略都会有所不同，<strong>将与当地需求匹配</strong>。比如在有许多年轻家庭的社区，会配置更多家庭用品和儿童用品；而混合型的社区，会放更多样的食物。为了做到这一点，Target 会深入社区做研究，同当地消费者、社团等开会来听取意见。</p><p>最近，Target 还想把小店开到大学校园附近，当前已经覆盖了 7 所学校，年底还会再开 3 家，地点包括了加州大学伯克利分校、塔夫茨大学、麻省理工学院、哈佛大学等。<strong>这些小店将迎合大学生需求，提供<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">外带食品和小吃。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">总体而言，这些本地化工作取得了一定成效，截至 8 月 4 日，Target 的季度收入为 17.78 亿美元，比分析师预期要高出 5 亿美元。虽然影响因素有很多，但小店和本地化策略也显然有一定帮助。</span></p><address><p><strong>NIKE BY MELROSE——使用数据将产品和服务与邻域需求相匹配</strong></p></address><p>耐克推出了“现场概念店”：NIKE BY MELROSE，<strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">该店利用数据和技术来为当地消费者量身定制店内产品</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">。他们</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">使用了来自 Nike.com 以及 NikePlus 的本地客户线上购物数据，从而决定店内选品，消费者甚至还可以使用 NikePlus 的应用程序来让耐克了解他们在穿着耐克服装时都在做什么。</span></p><p>例如，低帮运动鞋 Nike Cortez 在洛杉矶很受欢迎，所以洛杉矶商店里储存了各种颜色的 Cortez。</p><p>耐克计划每两周更换一次消费者数据来定制库存，让其产品与当地居民保持更密切的联系，还会根据洛杉矶消费者提供的需求定制城市风格，定制个性化的季节性优惠政策。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03073642/3nd1npn9bx4v753t.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="768,428"/></p><p><strong>除了本地化的库存和产品，耐克还计划定制商店服务以满足社区的需求。</strong>例如，为迎合洛杉矶的汽车文化，Nike by Melrose 洛杉矶店给没有时间停车或走进商店的顾客提供路边取货服务。&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>除了本地化，Nike by Melrose 还意图了解 NikePlus 会员的习惯，这样，他们只要走到商店周边，商店就可以识别到他们并为其保留一些特殊商品。耐克希望从这家商店出发，与客户建立联系，提供个性化、便利化的店内体验。</p><address><p><strong>阿迪达斯的 SPEED FACTORIES——定制服装</strong></p></address><p>在个性化的道路上，阿迪达斯已经领先一步。去年，阿迪达斯宣布推出新系列的本地化城市鞋，采用了 Speedfactories 这条生产线来制造。</p><p><strong>Speedfactory 是阿迪达斯开发的一种新型制造工厂，将整个鞋业的生产过程集中在一个屋檐下。</strong>过往阿迪达斯通常在亚洲生产鞋子，制作流程要几个月、跨越多个工厂，而 Speedfactories 可以在几天内、一个工厂中完成生产。其利用了各种数字化设施，比如&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">3D 打印、机器人手臂和自动化针织，减少了生产时间，也不太需要手工劳作。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">第一家 Speedfactory 于 2017 年在德国开设，2018 年春季则</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在亚特兰大开设了第二家。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Speedfactories 不仅能快速生产，还十分灵活，可以适应各个消费者的喜好，阿迪达斯已经</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">开始利用其 Speedfactories 来做本地化的鞋子生产。比如其新款&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">AM4（“Adidas made for”）系列运动鞋，就能为世界各个城市的跑步者提供定制设计的鞋子</span><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">AM4NYC 就专为纽约市街道网格的急转弯而设计，使用了运动科学数据和当地运动员的反馈数据来设计。</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">阿迪达斯还为伦敦、巴黎、洛杉矶和上海的跑步者设计了鞋子，不久后东京也将加入其中。</span></p><p><a href="https://s3.amazonaws.com/cbi-research-portal-uploads/2018/09/12142317/AM4.png"></a></p><p>每一款 AM4 都配备了近场通信芯片，跑者可以将鞋子与阿迪达斯移动应用程序同步，阿迪达斯还计划利用这项技术收集客户关于鞋子性能的反馈，以便迭代改进。</p><p>虽然阿迪达斯不打算停止在亚洲制造鞋子，但还是计划到 2020 年在其两个 Speedfactories 每年生产 100 万双鞋。未来，阿迪达斯的目标是数字化生产能占到 50% 的份额。</p><address><p><strong>启示是什么？</strong><br/></p></address><p>无论是专为大学生设计的小吃店，还是为城市跑者设计的运动鞋，<strong>Target、耐克和阿迪达斯都在使用本地化策略来吸引复购。</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">更重要的是，它们在使用数据和客户反馈来做产品和服务的迭代改进。未来，我们可能会看到零售商、品牌与客户之间的这种反馈进一步达成正向的循环。</span></p><p>本地化策略还可能成为完全个性化定制的踏脚石。AM4 就是个很好的例子，它也将<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">工厂作为探索个性化定制的试验场，阿迪达斯正在与 3D 制造创业公司&nbsp;</span><a href="https://www.cbinsights.com/company/carbon3d" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Carbon</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">（已经与阿迪达斯合作制作碳印鞋垫）合作，根据需求和规模为个人消费者量身定制服装。</span></p><p>随着服装公司进一步深入研究本地化和新的制造形式，我们将看到他们继续探索大规模个性化生产。</p>
title: 怎样吸引用户到店？Target、耐克和阿迪达斯的答案是“本地化”

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Rituals are ubiquitous across cultures and time. From marriage and burial rituals to pregame and postgame sporting rituals, these intentional routines have been performed for centuries to foster a desired outcome or behavior.</p><p>Now, organizations are tapping into the power of ritual to encourage innovation. These small acts can be used in the workplace to engender a sense of community, build cohesion and ultimately help take an organization from good to great.</p><h2>How rituals can help teams</h2><p>The sporting world is filled with examples of how rituals help wire organizations to achieve greatness. In fact, New Zealand's national rugby team, the All Blacks, credits much of their success to the rituals that form the bedrock of their culture. After each match—win or lose, home or away—everyone on the team cleans the dressing room until it’s spotless. It’s a ritual designed to show thanks, build humility and reinforce that each team member is just as important as the other. The <a href="http://time.com/5329250/japanese-fans-thank-you-world-cup/">Japanese soccer team beautifully demonstrated a similar ritual</a> when they left their locker room spotless after a gut-wrenching loss in the World Cup.</p><p>These sporting rituals are more than just good manners or superstitions. In fact, researchers are starting to find that these types of symbolic actions do in fact have an effect on behavior. According to recent studies, <a href="https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/ritual-and-the-brain/201709/how-rituals-alter-the-brain-help-us-perform-better">regularly performing rituals helps regulate emotions, elevate performance states and foster social connections</a>.</p><p>Take for example one of my favorite workplace rituals that happens at OXO, the global housewares manufacturer. The company focuses on building products that fit comfortably into people’s hands, and they adopted a team ritual to bring that value to light. Whenever an employee finds a lost glove, they bring it back to the office to hang on the wall to depict all the different hands they are designing things for. This ritual may look like a seemingly random act on the from the outside, but OXO defined a clear intention to constantly visualize and focus on who they are building products for.</p><h2>Using rituals to encourage innovation</h2><p>If you want to encourage innovation on your team, design rituals that emulate characteristics that are associated with it, <a href="https://rework.withgoogle.com/guides/understanding-team-effectiveness/steps/foster-psychological-safety/">like being comfortable with failure and team collaboration</a>.</p><p>Rituals can help build the muscle memory of an organization’s culture, but they have to be intentional and repeatable. Think of your ​organization’s​ ​operating system​ as its collective set of rules, norms and behaviors. These are the basic pieces of code that define how your organization runs. If you want to recode your organizational operating system to be more innovative, you must create new cultural algorithms in the form of rituals.</p><p>My team has a ritual that we take part in at the beginning of every weekly team meeting: Everyone shares a failure—personal or professional—and what they learned from it. The ritual is repeated every week and helps build psychology safety and comfort around failure. Similarly, Alphabet’s X holds an annual celebration that celebrates failure where they share stories about defunct projects, failed experiments and even personal failures. Old prototypes, sticky notes with product ideas and family mementos are placed on a small altar and burned during this ritual.</p><p>You can also develop rituals to encourage collaboration and strong team cohesiveness—characteristics which are associated with more creative teams. For example, Google employees can reward a coworker with a peer bonus when they go above and beyond and exemplify these qualities. Not only does the peer bonus ritual recognize the collaborator with a small monetary gift, but it also recognizes them with a thank you note that is sent to their peers and managers. We’ve built an entire peer bonus system online that allows team members to recognize this positive behavior again and again, helping to build reinforce this behavior.</p><br/><p>Ultimately, the rituals you build come down to the values you want to instill. Ask yourself: How can we bring our values to life and make them tangible through rituals? For centuries, humans have innately understood that small, tangible acts done routinely can carry meaning. Now it’s time to see how they can create new cultural algorithms for your organization or team to run on.  </p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Ignite innovation with workplace rituals

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>I first met Eve Rodriguez Montoya, the creator of <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZY8m3zjWEks&amp;t=23s">Yogolandia Yogurt &amp; Botana Bar</a>, at a roundtable focused on the challenges facing Latino-owned small businesses. In 2016, she wanted to bring more healthy food options to her neighborhood, Chicago’s Little Village. She decided to open a frozen yogurt shop that featured the Mexican flavors she grew up with and loved, like horchata, pepino and churros. And to bring her vision to life, she turned to technology. Google Search helped her learn how to create a business plan and to find suppliers. Once she was ready to open her doors, she used Google My Business to make sure customers could find her on Google Search and Maps. Today, business is thriving, she has four employees and she's collaborated with a few businesses in Chicago to feature her unique flavors.</p></div></div><div class="block-video"><div class="h-c-page h-c-page--mobile-full-bleed"><div class="h-c-grid"><div class="h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col-l--12 "><div class="article-module article-video "><figure><a class="h-c-video h-c-video--marquee" data-glue-modal-disabled-on-mobile="true" data-glue-modal-trigger="uni-modal-ZY8m3zjWEks-" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=ZY8m3zjWEks"><div class="article-video__aspect-image" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Screen_Shot_2018-10-02_at_9.58.56_PM.max-1000x1000.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Google My Business Stories: Yogolandia Yogurt &amp; Botana Bar</span></div><svg class="h-c-video__play h-c-icon h-c-icon--color-white" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-youtube-icon"></use></svg></a></figure></div></div></div></div><div class="h-c-modal--video" data-glue-modal="uni-modal-ZY8m3zjWEks-" data-glue-modal-close-label="Close Dialog"><a class="glue-yt-video" data-glue-yt-video-autoplay="true" data-glue-yt-video-height="99%" data-glue-yt-video-vid="ZY8m3zjWEks" data-glue-yt-video-width="100%" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=ZY8m3zjWEks" ng-cloak=""></a></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We’re excited to see how Latinos across the country are using technology to grow their businesses and support local communities. This Hispanic Heritage Month, we're encouraging Latino-led businesses to make sure they’ve <a href="https://www.google.com/intl/en/business/go/#?modal_active=none">claimed their free business listing</a> on Google. To help them keep growing, we’re also offering these businesses free marketing materials from <a href="https://smallthanks.withgoogle.com/">Small Thanks with Google</a>, including customized assets, like posters and social posts, featuring real Google reviews from customers.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="small thanks - hispanic heritage month" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Review_1_-_Social_Post_-_Small_Thanks.max-1000x1000.jpg"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>If you're a Latino-led business, make sure to get on the map. And to everyone else, we hope you'll join us in celebrating Hispanic Heritage Month and the small businesses in your community!</p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Thanking Latino-led small businesses this Hispanic Heritage Month

description: <address><p>核心提示：</p><p>Google的云部门正在迈向流媒体游戏的第一步。</p><p>如果Google能够实现这一目标，这可能是未来收入的重要来源。</p><p>流媒体游戏是一个复杂的工程问题。</p></address><p>Google正在通过其新的流媒体项目大举进军游戏市场，这一举措似乎与亚马逊庞大的云计算同样重要，Google正在成为游戏世界的一员。</p><p><strong>本周一，</strong><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5155793.html" target="_blank"><strong>Google 发布博文</strong></a><strong>宣布推出 Project Steam（流媒体计划）</strong>。简单来说，我们已经习惯于通过网络流媒体的方式，播放电影，电视节目和音乐等，Google认为视频游戏也可以用流媒体的方式，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从云端传输到一台计算机。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Project Steam</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">由Google云平台（GCP）小组领导，该小组将为新的基于云的视频游戏平台，提供基础架构。</span></p><p>从10月5号开始，GCP将允许数量有限的美国游戏玩家，通过他们的Chrome浏览器，玩Ubisoft广受欢迎的《刺客信条：奥德赛》游戏。用户将通过流媒体直接通过他们的Chrome浏览器播放，Google表示用户端需要的计算能力非常小。</p><p>Google通过GCP进军游戏已早有传闻。投资者认为Google是一家成长型公司，为了保持这种说法，管理人员需要新的收入来源，以便公司庞大的广告业务能够达到顶峰。为此，Google正在投入大量资源来开发云和人工智能。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师布莱恩·诺瓦克（Brian Nowak）周二在一份研究报告中写道，这是Google“驱动GCP发展”的机会，推出云游戏平台可以让Google与游戏玩家形成更直接的关系，可以利用它进一步扩展视频游戏价值链。</span></p><p>由Diane Greene领导的GCP管理层，将新的流媒体游戏计划描述为Project Stream技术的测试，以前代号为Yeti。<strong>云游戏已被证明是一项棘手的工程问题，Google将面临严峻的技术障碍</strong>。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5155793.html" target="_blank">早在 2015 年</a>，英伟达花费数年时间开发和测试了一个流媒体游戏服务—— GeForce NOW 。它能提供 1080p/60fps 的高清游戏体验，包含低延迟的游戏控制器，高效的 Tegra 处理器，独家的 Gameworks 特效，以及由 GeForce gtx 显卡构筑的强大的游戏引擎，每月收费 7.99 美元。但这项服务虽然体验绝佳但使用者却寥寥无几。</p><p>一是它仅支持在 shield 平板上使用，而 shield 平板市场占有量则远低于 3ds 与 PlayStationvita；二是在长达三个月的体验测试中，GeForce NOW 仅推出了五十个游戏；三是 GeForce NOW 对带宽的要求极高，国内的 5G 网络和 WIFI 环境难以支持流畅的游戏体验。</p><p>而<strong>一旦Google实现了目标，Project Stream将为GCP继续快速扩展到更广阔的云市场，提供强大助力。</strong></p>
title: 用流媒体游戏带动云业务，会是Google对抗AWS的有力武器吗？

description: <p>近日，罗氏宣布以里程碑付款的形式收购专注于肿瘤免疫治疗的英国公司TUSK Therapeutics，收购总额达到7.85亿美元。</p><p>就在今年10月1日，<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5155770.html" target="_blank">2018年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖被授予开创肿瘤免疫治疗领域的两位科学家James Allison和Tasuku Honjo。</a>这显示了肿瘤免疫治疗的广泛认可和广阔前景。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03050200/1c5dtqrsoxrg6qwf.png!heading" data-img-size-val="1238,486"/></p><p class="img-desc">图片来自TUSK官网</p><p>Tusk 的产品区别于两位获奖者开发的免疫检查点抑制剂PD-1和CTLA-4, 而是靶向调节性T细胞（Treg）。&nbsp;<br/></p><p>正常生理状态下Treg是一类抑制免疫反应的细胞，起到防止自身免疫疾病的作用。但肿瘤中的Treg也抑制了免疫系统对肿瘤的识别。已经有临床前实验证明，消除肿瘤微环境中的Treg可以增强对抗肿瘤的免疫反应。</p><p><strong>Tusk的在研抗体药物正是靶向Treg的靶点CD25，从而消除肿瘤中的Treg细胞。这款抗体和PD-1或者PD-L1抗体连用，有望大大提高治疗效果。</strong></p><p>Tusk的另一款在研抗体药物CD38是一款全新的免疫检查点抑制剂，很可能成为PD-1和PD-L1之后的新一代药物。强生的一款靶向CD38的药物Darzalex在多发性骨髓瘤的治疗中有很好的效果，Tusk希望将他们新的CD38抗体用于实体瘤的治疗。</p><blockquote><p>Tusk的CEO Luc Dochez表示，我们很高兴罗氏继续研发这一全新抗体药物。Tusk将组建新的公司Black Belt Therapeutics来推动其他肿瘤免疫学药物的研发。</p></blockquote><p>Tusk创建于2014年，其药物研发是基于英国伦敦大学学院（UCL）的Sergio Quezada教授的研究成果，它的战略合作伙伴包括UCL和英国癌症研究中心下属的Cancer Research Technology.</p><p>在收购Tusk之后，罗氏成为了靶向Treg用于治疗肿瘤的第一家大药企。在此之前，已有数家巨头开发靶向Treg的药物用于其他疾病治疗。<strong>礼来的药物KNTR-358是一款用于治疗系统性红斑狼疮的Treg激活剂。 诺华与Parvus合作开发了另一款Treg激活剂，用于减少杀伤胰岛B细胞的免疫细胞数量，从而治疗I型糖尿病。</strong></p><p>在肿瘤的免疫治疗领域，最近有多个针对全新靶点的药物正在研发中。<strong>8月底，艾伯维宣布联合比利时的Argenx公司开发靶向肿瘤免疫新靶点GARP的药物ARGX-115，目前正在临床前研究中。7月，以色列的BioLineRx宣布与默沙东合作，拓展BL-8040和PD-1抗体Keytruda的联合用药，用于转移性胰腺癌治疗。</strong></p>
title: 罗氏重资拓展肿瘤免疫疗法赛道，以7.85亿美元收购TUSK

description: <p>近日，位于美国马萨诸塞州的Morphic Therapeutic宣布完成8000万美元的B轮融资。</p><p>此次融资由原投资人Omega Funds和新投资人Novo Holdings共同领投，其他投资方包括Invus和EcoRI Capital，以及原投资人SR One，Pfizer Ventures，Abbvie Ventures, Polaris Partners, Schrodinger Inc.， ShangPharma Innovation Inc. 和共同创始人Timothy Springer。</p><p><strong>Morphic 致力于开发口服的小分子整合素抑制剂。</strong>整合素是在人体细胞表面广泛表达的受体蛋白，其介导了多条信号通路，可以调节细胞周期，细胞分化和迁移，免疫激活等过程。 <strong>整合素异常可能导致多种疾病的发生，而Morphic开发的药物就是通过靶向整合素来治疗纤维化疾病、自身免疫病和肿瘤。</strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03052925/f7dulhpotlaoxjrp.png!heading" data-img-size-val="1244,438"/></p><p class="img-desc">图片来自Morphic官网</p><p>目前已经有6个注射型的整合素药物被批准用于治疗自身免疫病和某些心血管疾病，但尚无一款口服药物，而且此前多款整合素抑制剂在研发过程中出现了安全性和有效性差的问题。基于使用安全性和便捷性的考虑，成功开发一种口服整合素药物将具有更广阔市场。<br/></p><p><strong>该公司创始人是哈佛大学医学院的Timothy Springer教授，他拥有对整合素结构的多年研究经验，并且对整合素的激活机理有深刻理解。同时，Morphic与Schrodinger公司建立了关于整合素的独家合作。</strong></p><p>Schrodinger公司是一家业内知名的化学模拟和计算机辅助药物设计公司，具有较强的机器学习和AI技术平台可以辅助药物设计。正是基于对整合素的结构生物学理解和强大的计算化学平台，Morphic力图高效的开发靶向特定整合素构象的小分子拮抗剂，来阻断疾病特异性的信号通路。</p><p>Morphic 的CEO Praveen Tipirneni表示，本轮融资将帮助公司完成几个项目的临床前研究，并推动两个项目进入临床。</p><p>目前Morphic的研发管线中有5个在研项目，其中进度最快的项目将于明年开始临床试验。该药物靶向integrin α5β6，用于治疗原发硬化性胆管炎。Morphic计划到2020年初启动第二个项目的临床试验，这个药物靶向integrin α4β7 来治疗肠道炎症。</p>
title: 开发口服的小分子整合素抑制剂，Morphic完成8000万美元B轮融资

description: <p>闹的沸沸扬扬的“阴阳合同”、偷税漏税问题终于有了结果。</p><p>“消失超近4个月后”，范冰冰终于发声。针对监管部门做出的处罚，她在微博上刊登的致歉信中表示，<strong>“对税务机关调查后，依法作出的一系列处罚决定，完全接受。将按照税务部门的最终处罚决定，尽全力克服一切困难，筹措资金、补缴税款、缴纳罚款。”</strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03045433/6zclvp3a03zb1hpi.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="1080,1528"/></p><p class="img-desc">范冰冰微博道歉</p><p>早前，据新华社报道，范冰冰“阴阳合同”涉税问题已经查清。<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/9l2Pkq2VVmyv7jUCHJVkEQ" target="_blank"><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从调查核实情况看</span></a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，范冰冰在电影《大轰炸》剧组拍摄过程中实际取得片酬3000万元，其中1000万元已经申报纳税，其余2000万元以拆分合同方式偷逃个人所得税618万元，少缴营业税及附加112万元，<strong>合计730万元</strong>。此外，还查出范冰冰及其担任法定代表人的企业少缴税款<strong>2.48亿元</strong>，其中偷逃税款<strong>1.34亿元</strong>。</span><br/></p><p>对于上述违法行为，根据国家税务总局指定管辖，江苏省税务局依据《中华人民共和国税收征管法》第三十二、五十二条的规定，对范冰冰及其担任法定代表人的企业追缴税款<strong>2.55亿元</strong>，加收滞纳金<strong>0.33亿元</strong>；依据《中华人民共和国税收征管法》第六十三条的规定，对范冰冰采取拆分合同手段隐瞒真实收入偷逃税款处4倍罚款计<strong>2.4亿元</strong>，对其利用工作室账户隐匿个人报酬的真实性质偷逃税款处3倍罚款计<strong>2.39亿元</strong>；对其担任法定代表人的企业少计收入偷逃税款处1倍罚款计<strong>94.6万元</strong>；依据《中华人民共和国税收征管法》第六十九条和《中华人民共和国税收征管法实施细则》第九十三条的规定，对其担任法定代表人的两户企业未代扣代缴个人所得税和非法提供便利协助少缴税款各处0.5倍罚款，分别计<strong>0.51亿元、0.65亿元</strong>。</p><p><strong>粗略计算，这些罚款的累计金额为8.83亿元。监管部门的规定还表明，上述定性为偷税的税款、滞纳金、罚款在税务机关下达追缴通知后在规定期限内缴纳的，依法不予追究刑事责任。</strong></p><p>范冰冰偷税问题要追溯到崔永元的爆料。在电影《手机2》开拍之际，著名主持人崔永元在微博发布写有范冰冰名字的拍摄合同，以及“大小合同”“4天6000万片酬”事件。</p><p>6月3日晚间，针对近日网上反映有关影视从业人员签订“阴阳合同”中的涉税问题，国家税务总局责成江苏等地税务机关依法开展调查核实。一日后，范冰冰工作室负责人称范冰冰及其工作室从未通过“阴阳合同”方式签约。同时，崔永元则表示：“向范冰冰致歉，4天6000万合同与她无关，但涉及到拍《手机》的人。”今日的调查也显示，范冰冰涉嫌偷税的电影为《大轰炸》。</p><p>报道还称，范冰冰任大股东的无锡爱美神影视文化有限公司纳税总额为0。范冰冰方面回应称，由于税务局正在核查，所以所有的税收数字不显示，并非纳税额为0。此后，范冰冰“消失近4个月”，直至今日有了调查结果。而且期限内交清罚款，并没有刑责。</p><p>过往范冰冰一句“我就是豪门”的话语曾传遍网络，从她过去几年的挣钱实力来看，不是豪门也胜似豪门，交上罚款应该不是大问题。</p><p><strong>去年9月25日，福布斯中国发布的“2017中国名人榜”显示，范冰冰的年收入达到了</strong><a href="http://finance.sina.com.cn/roll/2017-09-23/doc-ifymenmt6407539.shtml" target="_blank"><strong>3亿元</strong></a><strong>。要知道，这已经是她连续5年蝉联该榜榜首。</strong><strong style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">另外，福布斯公布的“2016全球十大最高收入女演员”榜单中，范冰冰以</strong><a href="http://www.sohu.com/a/112739766_162522" target="_blank" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"><strong>1.7千万美元</strong></a><strong style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">的收入排名第五，连续两年上榜，为唯一榜上有名的女华人。如果</strong><strong style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">根据2008-2017年福布斯中国名人榜发布的收入数据，范冰冰近10年累计收入高达<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5155690.html" target="_blank">11.3亿元</a>。</strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03040423/r125qjbduowm8m91!heading" data-img-size-val="640,507"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从去年的名人榜数据来看，范冰冰凭借电影《我不是潘金莲》村姑李雪莲一角再封影后，同年还拍了《绝地逃亡》、《封神传奇》、《爵迹》等8部电影。据称范冰冰单部电影的片酬在<a href="http://ent.qq.com/a/20170925/064432.htm" target="_blank">800~1000万之间</a>，这8部电影粗略计算有6400万元。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">电视剧方面，由其主演并参与投资的女性励志电视剧《赢天下》未播先热，吸引天猫技术以4.8亿元天价购买其网络独播权。《武媚娘传奇》播出时，媒体曾报道范冰冰的片酬为3000万元。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此外范冰冰在综艺和大牌代言方面，收入也不菲。近来，其与李晨组成的CP，在吸粉和收入方面也助力不少。</span></p><p><strong>以范冰冰在娱乐圈的资历，或许可以还的上这些罚款。但监管的红线，确实也在为影视行业、明星们敲打着警钟。从既往的规定来看，将会越来越严。<br/></strong></p><p>继去年四部门联合发布的《关于电视剧网络剧制作成本配置比例的意见》后，今年6月<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">中宣部等五部门联合印发《通知》，要求加强对影视行业天价片酬、“阴阳合同”、偷逃税等问题的治理。《通知》强调，现阶段严格落实已有规定，每部电影、电视剧、网络视听节目全部演员、嘉宾的总片酬不得超过制作总成本的40%，主要演员片酬不得超过总片酬的70%。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>为了进一步落实上述各项规定，<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5147703.html" target="_blank">8月11日</a>，爱奇艺、优酷、腾讯视频三家视频网站即日起联合正午阳光等六大制片公司发出声明，共同抵制艺人“天价”片酬现象，共同抵制偷逃税、“阴阳合同”等违法行为。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">声明中还提到，三家视频网站和六家影视制作公司采购和制作的所有影视剧，艺人单集片酬（含税）最高不得超过100万元人民币，总片酬（含税）不得超过5000万元人民币。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">9月11日，<a href="http://ent.qq.com/a/20180919/005696.htm" target="_blank">据腾讯娱乐报道</a>，有消息称总局接下去将严控综艺节目艺人的片酬，每期节目艺人总片酬不能超过80万，常驻嘉宾一季节目下来的片酬不能超过1000万。对此，有多位业内人士称此事属实。有业内人士表示，早在7月，广电总局发《通知》管控暑期偶像养成、歌唱才艺竞秀类网综时，自己所在的平台就接受到了总局指令。</span></p>
title: 最前线 | 范冰冰微博就逃税问题道歉，完全接受监管部门近9亿元罚款

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Patent quality is a two-way street. Patent applicants should submit detailed disclosures describing their inventions and actively participate in the examination process to define clear distinctions between their inventions and existing technology. Examiners reviewing patent applications should conduct thorough searches of existing technology, reject any attempts to patent existing technology, and develop a clear record of the differences between the patent claims and what came before. The more that the patent system supports and incentivizes these activities, the more reliable the rights that issue from patent offices will be, and the more those patents will promote innovation.</p><br/><p>A healthy patent system requires that patent applicants and examiners be able to find and access the best documentation of state-of-the-art technology. This documentation is often found in sources other than patents. Non-patent literature can be particularly hard to find and access in the software field, where it may take the form of user manuals, technical specifications, or product marketing materials. Without access to this information, patent offices may issue patents covering existing technology, or not recognize trivial extensions of published research, removing the public’s right to use it and bringing the reliability of patent rights into question.</p><br/><p>To address this problem, academia and industry have worked together to launch the Prior Art Archive, created through a collaboration between the MIT Media Lab, <a href="https://blogs.cisco.com/news/using-technology-to-promote-high-quality-patents">Cisco</a> and the USPTO, and hosted by MIT. The Prior Art Archive is a new, open access system that allows anyone to upload those hard-to-find technical materials and make them easily searchable by everyone.</p><br/><p>We’re proud to support the Prior Art Archive, and have devoted significant resources to this and other important quality initiatives. The Prior Art Archive is searchable through <a href="https://patents.google.com/?scholar">Google Patents</a>,  and all of the documents in the Archive have been labeled with Cooperative Patent Classification codes using Google’s machine learning models. The labels are a feature we <a href="https://publicpolicy.googleblog.com/2015/07/good-patents-support-innovation-while.html">rolled out</a> in Google Patents to help make the most relevant technical materials easier to find. We’ve also recently launched a site accessible to the public and examiners, <a href="https://www.tdcommons.org/">TDCommons</a>, where companies can publish technical information they don’t want to patent free of charge.  </p><br/><p>We’re also excited to use AI and machine learning to take prior art searching to the next level. To this end, we’ve recently created an open ecosystem, the <a href="https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/gcp/google-patents-public-datasets-connecting-public-paid-and-private-patent-data">Google Patents Public Datasets</a>, to make large datasets available for empirical public policy, economics, and machine learning research. We’re committed to developing and making available technology that improves patent quality, and ultimately strengthens our patent system.</p><p><br/></p></div></div></body></html>
rss_title: The Keyword
title: Coming together to create a prior art archive

description: <h3 class="article-title"></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">巴黎当地时间10月1日，雷诺发布了一款全新紧凑型纯电动SUV概念车——K-ZE。雷诺集团董事长兼首席执行官卡洛斯·戈恩透露，K-ZE量产版车型将于2019年率先在雷诺十堰工厂实现国产，随后出口全球。</span><br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/02061822/0ajy38kyika42s74!heading" data-img-size-val="1620,1080"/></p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc">雷诺集团董事长兼首席执行官卡洛斯·戈恩</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">据悉，这款新车基于雷诺-日产联盟共享的电动车平台打造，NEDC工况下续航里程将超过250公里。到2025年，雷诺日产三菱联盟将年产1400万辆汽车，其中百分之十是纯电动车。雷诺集团董事长兼首席执行官卡洛斯·戈恩称，比起七八年前，人们对电动车的担心正日益减少，动力电池的重量正在变得越来取轻、成本越来越低，技术也不再复杂深奥。</span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/02061823/2wbz0bc94c1gpnoe!heading" data-img-size-val="720,480"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">另外今后雷诺也将加大对中国的新车投放力度，到2022年将有包括新能源在内的9款车型供消费者选择。当然雷诺K-ZE也会在欧洲市场销售，并且到2020年，欧洲市场还会拥有另外三款新的纯电和插电式混动动力车型。</span><br/></p><p>雷诺K-ZE纯电动车定位于小型SUV，要比奔驰近期发布的EQC要小很多。这次展示的是show car车型，还未达到真正的量产状态，后续还会一些细节上改进。外观设计小巧，整体运用了不少蓝色元素来凸显其新能源车的定位。</p><p>从外观来看，新车采用小巧精致的设计风格，中网处造型较为独特，装饰有两根黑色条，中央的雷诺LOGO周围带有蓝色元素，证明其新能源车型身份。两侧狭长的前大灯让前脸看起来更为犀利，雾灯区域为三角形，内部带有三个LED光源。</p><p>车身侧面，新车采用较为圆润的设计，侧裙上方为镂空设计，配备全新样式的花瓣样式轮圈设计，并在侧裙、轮圈、以及车顶处带有蓝色元素。车尾来看，新车采用较为饱满的设计风格，配备较大尺寸的尾灯造型，内部为C型设计，看起来辨识度较高。新车尚未公布内饰以及动力等详细信息。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">官方消息称，新车将会在明年在国内生产，而以此车为起点，雷诺将在中国市场发起电动车攻势，电动汽车也将成为其未来新的销量增长点。</span><br/></p>
title: 雷诺全新电动SUV概念车巴黎首发，将于明年在中国国产

description: <p>ASMR，Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response，中文译名「自发性知觉经络反应」，它主要是指通过视觉、听觉、触觉、嗅觉或者感知上的刺激，让人在颅内、头皮、背部或身体其他范围内产生一种独特的、令人愉悦的刺激感。</p><p>是不是听起来有点音视频平台做擦边球内容的意思？的确，ASMR 在中国一直和软色情有关。虎牙、斗鱼、荔枝等平台先后出台过关闭频道、禁止主播传播&nbsp;ASMR 内容的行动。</p><p>不过海外，依然有许多人通过看 YouTube 的 ASMR 视频来帮助他们控制焦虑、助眠，或者获得愉悦感。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">YouTube 上的&nbsp;ASMR 视频千奇百怪，有梳着头发、用指甲敲击麦克风，还有 POV 角色扮演。这些内容创作者被称为“asmrologist”，类似护理师或者医生为用户进行“颅内检查”、提供颅内高潮。YouTube&nbsp;最受欢迎的频道「Gentle Whispering ASMR」（ASMR温柔低语）已经有近 150 万订阅用户。</span></p><p>Kat Tenbarge 去年开始运营着自己的频道&nbsp;<a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtYfzLtrI6RSApOlkOCQgZw">Kat Whispers ASMR</a>，她是俄亥俄大学新闻与环境研究专业的学生，她希望能更好的通过自媒体内容变现。</p><p>Tenbarge 表示，虽然她没有很多订阅者，但她在发布内容后不久，就收到了一个自定义视频请求。“这令我感到惊讶”她说，“我以前认为，只有哪些有大批追随者的达人才会有定制化变现的可能。但实际上情况正好相反 —— 大牌 YouTubers 可能没有时间接受个性化定制，他们也可能不需要或不想要额外的收入。”</p><p>Tenbarge 介绍，要求定制的客户可以指定他们喜欢的 ASMR 触发机制、视频长度和其他细节。一般来说，Tenbarge 提供 25 美元的编辑和准备费用，以及每分钟拍摄 2.5 美元的费用。算下来，30 分钟的视频，通常需要 100 美元定制费。</p><p>但算上前期剧本、排练、服化道准备时间，ASMR 内容生产者差不过每小时能获得 10 美元收益。钱<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">不算多，但对于无法从广告中赚钱的博主／达人来说，这是一种快速变现的方式。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">类似于制造业的发达推动了 C2M（顾客需求直达供应链），从内容形态来看，ASMR 可以说是直播、短视频领域内「顾客需求直达内容生产者」的代表。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从涉及软色情的角度来看，虽然相关监管机构和音视频平台都面临着严峻的监管压力。但&nbsp;<a href="https://peerj.com/articles/851.pdf">2015 年 3 月发表的</a>关于&nbsp;ASMR&nbsp;的研究报告指出，约有 5％ 的参与者表示他们使用 ASMR 进行性刺激，82％ 的人表示他们将其用于助眠，70％ 的人用作缓解压力。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此前据媒体报道，温彻斯特的雪兰多大学的生物制药科学教授 Craig Richard 对世界各地近两万人进行了调查，数据显示，四分之三的受试者使用ASMR视频来帮助他们睡眠，三分之一说视频可以帮助他们“感到放松”，较小的百分比使用视频来处理焦虑障碍和抑郁症。他认为，ASMR 有一天可以用于医疗。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在中国，虽然&nbsp;ASMR 还未大行其道，但夜听、等自媒体，已经多次验证睡前音频是一个绝佳的涨粉场景。而睡前助眠的需求量又如此之大，从内容变现、内容生产机制来看，如果上述研报数据是真实无误的，则说明合法合规的「哄睡内容定制」是一门值得深入研究的产业。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">相关阅读：</span></h3><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif"><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5133757.html" target="_blank">软色情、二次元，总是被误解的ASMR离成功“洗白”还有多远</a></span></p><p><strong>注：我是36氪茉小莉，关注文娱、消费领域的新鲜事，交流可加微信 Spontaneous-Literary，劳请备注姓名、公司、职位。</strong></p>
title: 音视频定制，YouTube 的 ASMR 达人们发现了新的变现途径

description: <p>北京时间 10 月 3 日凌晨，微软秋季新品发布会 2018 在美国纽约举办。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">发布会上</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">微软</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">推出了新款耳机 </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Surface Headphones</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，该款耳罩式无线耳机具备可调式噪音消除功能，可让用户精确控制外出时的噪音。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">售价 350 美元，约合人民币 2403 元。</span></p><p>Surface Headphones 每个耳罩上有 2 个波束形成麦克风，共有 8 个麦克风，提供 13 级降噪。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">用户可以旋转左耳罩上的拨盘</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">更改噪音消除的级别，转动右侧</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">拨盘</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">则可调节音量。</span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03021943/tqag6vk8x6mwg22v!heading" data-img-size-val="720,405"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">据官方介绍，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Surface Headphones </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">通过 USB Type C 或者可拆卸的 3.5mm 电缆充电充电。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">可在 </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">2 小时内充满量，蓝牙下播放音乐续航超过 15 小时；插线情况下音乐播放续航超过 50 小时。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此外，Surface Headphones 还搭载了微软的语音助手「小娜」，支持通过「Hey Cortana」唤醒词来调用语音操控系统，从而完成诸如播放、暂停、切换歌曲等一系列操作，取下耳机还能自动暂停音乐。</span></p><p>除了可以与 Surface 笔记本电脑配合使用，也支持包括 iOS、Android 以及 MacOS 在内的其它设备。不过，发布会上微软并未给出明确的发货日期。</p><p><a href="https://www.cnet.com/reviews/microsoft-surface-headphones-preview/?ftag=COS-05-10aaa0b&linkId=57657769">根据CNET的</a><a href="https://www.cnet.com/reviews/microsoft-surface-headphones-preview/?ftag=COS-05-10aaa0b&linkId=57657769">说法</a>，Surface 耳机已经开发了三年，旨在与 Bose 和 Sony 争夺用户和市场，这两家公司是目前降噪耳机领域的头部品牌。</p><p>Cortana 的语音操控功能会影响电池续航时间，且截至目前，用户无法将其关闭，但如果怕隐私语音信息泄露，用户可以选择将麦克风静音以保护隐私。</p><p>微软做耳机很奇怪吗？其实也并没有那么奇怪，不少科技公司、互联网公司都在做智能音响、智能耳机设备，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">它们是生态链的补充，也是相对低成本、大规模搜集用户数据，同时研发、迭代人工智能操作系统的有效途径。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">但问题是，放在同类耳机中微软的耳机有没有竞争力？或者说，它是否可以与&nbsp;</span><a href="https://www.cnet.com/reviews/bose-quietcomfort-35-ii-review/" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Bose</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">和</span><a href="https://www.cnet.com/reviews/sony-wh-1000xm3-preview/" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Sony</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">的顶级降噪耳机竞争。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>从发布会信息来看，微软正在强调 Cortana 语音控制功能，以便使耳机与竞争机型和品牌区别开来。&nbsp;</p><p>此前，Bose 发布的 QuietComfort 35 II&nbsp;无线降噪耳机也支持智能语音操控系统，氪连接至Google&nbsp;智能助理（适用于 Android 和 iOS 设备）售价也在&nbsp;350 美元左右。</p><p>索尼的&nbsp;WH-1000XM3，售价同样 350 美元左右，该款机型更新了芯片，索尼表示，其新型高清降噪处理器 QN1 的性能是此前产品的四倍。其快速充电功能也很强大，能充电&nbsp;10 分钟续航 5 小时。</p><p>除了功能上的竞争，市场营销方面微软也不一定占有优势。在用户心智中，卖降噪耳机首先会想到 Bose 和索尼，是够还能接受同等价位但功能差异不大的Surface Headphones？我们等待销售数据的反馈。</p>
title: 微软推出降噪型智能耳机 Surface Headphones，搭载智能语音助手小娜

description: <p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/03035723/rjojxc89q9bvgq1i.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1242,776"/></p><p>美国时间9月30日，步步高集团董事长段永平在斯坦福校园和华人学子们进行了主题为《基业长青的秘密：Stop Doing List》的交流分享，他谈到了几个通用的Stop Doing List：“不要走捷径，不要相信弯道超车。弯道超车是不开车和不坐车的人说的，总会被反超的。”</p><p>这位被称为“东方巴菲特”的企业家还谈到做企业和投资的Stop Doing List，如，</p><p>“不做空。这方面我曾经犯过错误，尤其是不要做空长期的好公司，比如早年的百度。”</p><p>&quot;不要一年做20个决策。1年做20个决策，肯定会出错，那不是价值投资。一辈子做20个投资决策就够了。&quot;<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/aTLl6IwheRincZXr6sSErg" target="_blank" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">（详情阅读）</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><br/></p>
title: 大佬言论 | 段永平：不要相信弯道超车
